在首都逗留期间，拉夫连季从线人那里得知，距离叶努基泽的陷落只剩下几个月的时间了。贝利亚决定向斯大林透露一些细节，这些细节可以用来对付这位高加索布尔什维克主义的先驱。拉夫连季特别批评了叶努基泽的生活方式：模范共产主义者不应该有这样的行为。贝利亚还向斯大林谈到了谢尔戈·奥尔忠尼启则犯下的某些罪行。斯大林知道，谢尔戈的副手和他的私人朋友格里戈里·皮达科夫虽然是一位经验丰富的共产主义者，但作为管理者表现出了一定的弱点，并且由于他的管理不善，未能实现为其部门设定的目标。然而，塞尔戈并没有惩罚罪魁祸首，而是继续通过伪造报告来保护他。根据贝利亚提供的文件，奥尔忠尼启泽与其好友、格鲁吉亚前人民委员会主席、时任外高加索联邦委员会秘书卡特维利奇维利保持着经常联系。但是，尽管卡尔特维利奇维利被解除职务，为贝利亚让路，但他仍然是奥尔忠尼启则的得意门生。

During his stay in the capital, Lavrenti learns from his informants that the fall of Yenukidze is only a matter of months away. Beria decides to reveal to Stalin certain details which could be used against this pioneer of Bolshevism in the Caucasus. Lavrenty particularly criticizes the lifestyle of Yenoukidze: a model communist should not behave like this. Beria also speaks to Stalin about certain crimes committed by Sergo Ordzhonikidze. Stalin knows that Sergo's deputy and his personal friend, Grigory Pyatakov, although an experienced communist, showed a certain weakness as an administrator and, through his mismanagement, failed to achieve the objectives set for his department. However, instead of punishing the culprit, Sergo continues to protect him by falsifying the reports. According to the documents produced by Beria, Ordzhonikidze is in constant contact with his good friend Kartvelichvili, former chairman of the Council of People's Commissars of Georgia, then secretary of the Committee of the Transcaucasian Federation. But, although he was relieved of his duties to make way for Beria, Kartvelichvili is still Ordzhonikidze's protege.

晚上，斯大林邀请他的几位亲戚和朋友到他位于孔采沃的别墅Blijni用餐。阿利卢耶夫夫妇是斯大林第二任妻子娜杰日达的父母，他们带着二女儿安娜前来。斯大林第一任妻子叶卡捷琳娜的弟弟阿列克谢·斯瓦尼泽也在场。在其他客人中，我们注意到总是微笑的阿纳斯塔斯·米高扬和由他的妻子齐娜伊达陪伴的“亲爱的塞尔戈”奥尔琼尼启泽。即使是年轻的斯维特兰娜也被允许加入客人的行列。

In the evening, Stalin invites several of his relatives and friends to dine at Blijni , his villa in Kountsevo. The Alliluyevs, parents of Stalin's second wife, Nadezhda, come with their second daughter Anna. Alexei Svanidze, brother of Stalin's first wife, Ekaterina, is also present. Among the other guests, we note the always smiling Anastase Mikoyan and the "dear Sergo" Ordjonikidze accompanied by his wife Zinaïda. Even young Svetlana is allowed to join the guests.

贝利亚在她童年时期被斯维特兰娜称为“拉拉叔叔”，小时候经常和她一起玩。他这样做不仅是为了表达他对独裁者心爱的女儿的亲切感情，也是为了他将年幼的女孩抱在腿上所获得的性快感。现在他的爱抚仅限于亲吻她的脸颊或坐在她旁边。斯维特兰娜已经十一岁了，贝利亚不想因为表现出她对年轻女性的品味而引起流言蜚语。所以他注意自己的行为。

Beria, whom Svetlana called "Uncle Lara" in her early childhood, used to play with her when she was a child. He did this not only to show his cordial feelings for the dictator's beloved daughter, but also for the sexual pleasure he derived from holding very young girls on his lap. Now his caresses are limited to kisses on the cheek or sitting next to her. Svetlana is already eleven years old, and Beria does not want to cause gossip by showing her taste for very young women. So he watches his conduct.

亲爱的很优秀。这里洋溢着阖家团聚的气氛，其乐融融。大家谈笑风生，喝着Kakheti红酒。晚餐结束，大家前往大露台。在那里，熟悉许多伤感和浪漫的乌克兰民谣的Kommandarm Semion Boudenni 拿起了他的手风琴。很快，全场观众以一种无比真挚的和弦，合唱着优美的民歌，欢快的旋律在俄罗斯六月炎热的夜晚欢快地响起。

The dear is excellent. There is an atmosphere of family reunion, cheerful and friendly. Everyone talks with a light heart and drinks Kakheti red wine. Dinner over, everyone heads for the large terrace. There, Kommandarm Semion Boudenni, who knows many sentimental and romantic Ukrainian ballads, takes up his accordion. Soon, the whole audience, in a wonderfully sincere chord, takes up the beautiful folk songs in chorus, while the joyful melodies ring out cheerfully in the hot night of Russian June.

评级

Ratings

25 . 1956年2月25日，尼基塔·赫鲁晓夫在苏共第二十次 代表大会（巴黎，1970年）上提交了关于斯大林的秘密报告。

25 . Nikita Khrushchev's secret report on Stalin presented on February 25, 1956 at the 20th Congress  of the CPSU (Paris, 1970).

第25章

Chapter 25

如何杀死你的朋友

how to kill your friends

很快，莫斯科的事件以雪崩的速度发生。在斯大林决定进行的大清洗期间，几位知名人士被起诉。列夫·鲍里索维奇·加米涅夫（Lev Borisovitch Kamenev）和格里戈里·叶夫谢耶维奇·季诺维也夫（Grigori Yevseievitch Zinoviev）是两位自 1901 年以来活跃的布尔什维克老兵，也是十月革命的先驱，他们被捕并承认了自己的罪行：他们是托洛茨基主义者，组织了刺客、叛徒和外国特工团伙。他们以及其他 14 名被指控与他们合作或参与其颠覆组织的人均已认罪。审判于1936年8月19日开始，历时六天，最终以被告人被判处死刑而告终。没有上诉，被判刑的人会在二十四小时内被处决。贝利亚对审判有自己的想法。在十六名被告中，两名主要被告加米涅夫和季诺维也夫是列宁及其崇拜者的亲密朋友。他们是政治局委员和中央关键人物。1920年，季诺维也夫担任共产国际（共产国际）主席。换句话说，他们的活动至少与斯大林的活动一样光荣和有功。但两人都是犹太人。格里戈里·叶夫谢耶维奇·季诺维耶夫实际上被称为赫希·阿普菲尔鲍姆，而列夫·加米涅夫原名罗森菲尔德。此外，加米涅夫在第比利斯长大，并在那里读了中学，领导了格鲁吉亚的共产主义斗争，至少可以说，他在工人中的地下活动与斯大林的地下活动一样广为人知。这严重影响了斯大林的野心，他希望继续成为高加索地区唯一的共产主义英雄。加米涅夫与列宁关系密切，拥护格鲁吉亚党，代表列宁在该国的政治路线。而且列宁的观点与斯大林的观点不同。加米涅夫还有经常出国旅行的习惯。他作为共产国际第三次代表大会的代表在伦敦呆了几个星期。对于把每个人都视为间谍的斯大林来说，加米涅夫似乎已经与伦敦的英国特工建立了联系。此外，他还娶了托洛茨基的妹妹，而他作为叛徒姐夫的身份也使他成为叛徒。但最重要的是，当斯大林逃离流放地时，加米涅夫帮助他在第比利斯找到了一个藏身之处。他做得如此巧妙，以至于沙皇警察尽管搜查了加米涅夫的公寓并对房客进行了询问，但仍无法逮捕逃犯。这一壮举的成功足以让斯大林判处加米涅夫死刑，因为他厌恶任何形式的慈善或自发的同情。加米涅夫也有可能在他的回忆录中揭露这一事件。斯大林不想让人们知道他的秘密活动得到了帮助。

Soon, events rush in Moscow, at the speed of an avalanche. During a great purge decided by Stalin, several eminent personalities are indicted. Lev Borisovitch Kamenev and Grigori Yevseievitch Zinoviev, two veteran Bolsheviks, active since 1901, and pioneers of the October Revolution, are arrested and confess their crimes: they are Trotskyists, have organized bands of assassins, traitors and foreign agents. They plead guilty, along with fourteen other people accused of having collaborated with them or of being part of their subversive organization. The trial began on August 19, 1936, lasted six days and ended with the death sentence of the defendants. There is no appeal and the condemned are executed within twenty-four hours. Beria has his own idea about the trial. Of the group of sixteen defendants, the two main ones, Kamenev and Zinoviev, were close friends of Lenin and his admirers. They were members of the Politburo and key figures in the Central Committee. In 1920, Zinoviev was president of the Comintern (the Communist International). In other words, their activities were at least as honorable and as meritorious as those of Stalin. But both are Jews. Grigori Yevseevich Zinoviev is actually called Hirsch Apfelbaum, while Lev Kamenev was born Rosenfeld. Furthermore, Kamenev, raised in Tiflis where he attended middle school, led the communist fight in Georgia where his underground activity among the workers is, to say the least, as well known as that of Stalin. This weighs heavily on the ambitions of Stalin who wants to remain the one and only communist hero of the Caucasus. Kamenev, strongly linked to Lenin, adheres to the Georgian Party and represents Lenin's political line in this country. And Lenin's point of view differs from Stalin's. Kamenev also makes a habit of traveling abroad frequently. He spent several weeks in London as a delegate to the Third Congress of the Communist International. For Stalin, who saw everyone as a spy, it seemed that Kamenev had established contacts with British agents in London. Furthermore, he married Trotsky's sister and his status as the traitor's brother-in-law makes him a traitor as well. But above all, when Stalin escaped from exile, Kamenev helped him find a hiding place in Tiflis. He did it so deftly that the Tsarist police were unable to nab the fugitive despite a search of Kamenev's apartment and an inquiry of the tenants. The success of such a feat was enough for Stalin to condemn Kamenev to death, for he loathed any form of charity or spontaneous sympathy. There is also the danger that Kamenev will reveal this event in his memoirs. Stalin does not want people to know that he was helped in his clandestine activities.

至于这些供词，贝利亚对它们是如何获得的不抱任何幻想。内务人民委员部使用安全方法收集证据并为被告做好审判准备。总检察长安德烈·亚努阿列维奇·维辛斯基（Andrei Yanouarevich Vyshinsky）肯定会获得支持指控的所有必要要素。由于几名被告在基洛夫遇刺后立即被捕，而长期监禁使他们更有可能屈服于原告的意愿，这一点就更加明显。

As for the confessions, Beria harbors no illusions about how they were obtained. The NKVD uses secure methods to gather evidence and prepare defendants for trial. Prosecutor General Andrei Yanouarevich Vyshinsky is certain to obtain all the elements necessary to support the accusation. This is all the more evident since several defendants were arrested immediately after Kirov's assassination and a prolonged stay behind bars made them more likely to bend to the will of the accusers.

在进行了这次壮观的审判后，斯大林前往格鲁吉亚度暑假。像往常一样，他乘坐私人火车旅行，全副武装，并受到红军将军尼古拉·弗拉西克指挥的保镖排的保护。弗拉西克是一个朴实粗暴的农民，不识字，但却天生具有感知危险的天赋。直到最后一刻，没有人知道独裁者将乘坐哪一辆车，在火车停靠加油水和煤的每个城镇，当地警察都被要求清空车站并用部队包围。

After mounting this spectacular trial, Stalin leaves to take his summer vacation in Georgia. As usual, he travels in his private train, armored and protected by platoons of bodyguards under the command of General of the Red Army Nikolai Vlasik. Vlasik is a simple and rough peasant, illiterate, but endowed with an innate flair for sensing danger. Until the last minute, no one knows in which car the dictator will travel, and in each town where the train stops to refuel water and coal, the local police are asked to empty the station and to surround it with a cordon of troops.

这次，斯大林任命共产党中央委员会书记安德烈·亚历山德罗维奇·日丹诺夫为助手。他选择他不仅是为了与他为伴，而且还委托他执行一项繁重的任务，这是他在黑海沿岸逗留期间必须完成的任务。

This time, Stalin takes as deputy Andreï Alexandrovitch Zhdanov, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party. He chose him not only for the pleasure of his company, but also to entrust him with a heavy task which he will have to accomplish during his stay on the shores of the Black Sea.

当火车到达第比利斯车站时，监控细节由贝利亚亲自负责。

When the train arrives at Tbilisi station, the details of the monitoring are taken care of by Beria himself.

在格鲁吉亚首都短暂停留期间，斯大林大部分时间都在生病的母亲床边度过。她已经八十岁了。

During his brief stay in the capital of Georgia, Stalin spent most of his time at the bedside of his sick mother. She is eighty years old.

两天后，斯大林前往索契的别墅。然而，今年夏天并不是休息或放松的时候。日丹诺夫更多地担任秘书而不是助手或顾问，斯大林决定对布哈林、季诺维也夫和拉狄克为他准备的宪法草案进行最后的修改，这些都是他计划早晚消灭的杰出共产党人。担任总检察长维辛斯基。他想为镇压几位老布尔什维克做好准备，这些老布尔什维克虽然具有独立精神，但仍阻碍他获得绝对权力。

Two days later, Stalin leaves for his villa in Sochi. This summer, however, is not the time for rest or relaxation. With Zhdanov, who served more as secretary than assistant or adviser, Stalin decided to put the finishing touches to the draft constitution prepared for him by Bukharin, Zinoviev and Radek, all eminent communists whom he planned to annihilate sooner or later. later, as well as Prosecutor General Vyshinsky. He wants to prepare the ground for the crushing of several old Bolsheviks who, having an independent spirit, still bar his way to absolute power.

然而，根据官方说法，斯大林正在他位于阿布哈兹的美丽庄园度假。晚上，他邀请了他的同胞和最好的朋友贝利亚、拉科巴和姆迪瓦尼。在他们的陪伴下，他可以畅所欲言，吃喝满足。

Officially, however, Stalin is staying at his beautiful estate in Abkhazia for a vacation. In the evening, he invites his compatriots and best friends Beria, Lakoba and Mdivani. In their company, he can speak freely, eat and drink to his satisfaction.

为了发动一场比加米涅夫和季诺维也夫那次更加危险的新清洗，这位独裁者需要一个比内务人民委员部现任领导人亚戈达更加无情的人。作为整个苏联秘密警察的负责人，他在基洛夫暗杀案中履行了自己的职责，该案成为大规模逮捕斯大林潜在敌人的借口。这一类别包括布尔什维克中最有功绩和最杰出的人。鉴于亚戈达以前是一名药剂师，他被任命为克里姆林宫毒理学实验室负责人，由此开始了他的现役生涯。这使得他加速了列宁的死亡，无论如何，列宁在三次袭击中恢复得很差。GPU的上司维亚切斯拉夫·门任斯基（Vyacheslav Menzhinsky）意外去世。事实证明，他的科学再次有效地结束了高尔基的痛苦咳嗽。这位作家曾经拒绝写一本关于斯大林的书，这足以说服独裁者镇压这本书。亚戈达所做的一切都是遵照他的主人、伟大的斯大林同志的命令进行的。

To launch a new purge, even more treacherous than the one that hit Kamenev and Zinoviev, the dictator needs someone even more ruthless than Yagoda, the current leader of the NKVD. As head of the secret police for the whole of the USSR, he fulfilled his duties in the Kirov assassination case, which served as the pretext for the mass arrest of potential enemies of Stalin. This category included the most meritorious and eminent of the Bolsheviks. His active service began when, in view of his former profession as a pharmacist, Yagoda was appointed head of the Kremlin Toxicology Laboratory. This allowed him to hasten the death of Lenin who, in any case, was recovering badly from three attacks.GPU when his superior Vyacheslav Menzhinsky died unexpectedly. His science proved to be useful again in putting an end to Gorky's painful coughing spells for good. The writer had once refused to write a book on Stalin and that was enough to convince the dictator to suppress it. Everything Yagoda had done had been done by order of his master, the great comrade Stalin.

现在雅戈达的服务已经做得足够了。斯大林不再需要他，这个职位可以交给贝利亚，但斯大林希望让后者在高加索地区停留一段时间，以便在格鲁吉亚、阿塞拜疆和亚美尼亚进行清洗，直到最终消灭其所体现的名义独立的最后痕迹。外高加索联邦。

Now Yagoda has done enough service. Stalin no longer needs him, the post could go to Beria, but Stalin wants to keep the latter for some time in the Caucasus to carry out purges in Georgia, Azerbaijan and Armenia until the final liquidation of the last traces of the nominal independence embodied by the Transcaucasian Federation.

斯大林选择了前红军政治委员、时任党中央委员的尼古拉·伊万诺维奇·叶约夫代替亚戈达。叶约夫被任命为党干部处处长，很快当选为中央委员会委员和政治局与安全部的联络官。但是，尽管获得了所有这些荣誉，叶乔夫仍然遭受着贫困的童年和缺乏教育的困扰。他讨厌知识分子和任何脱颖而出的人。这其中包括许多布尔什维克，新秩序的创造者。斯大林意识到了这种仇恨，并坚信叶乔夫会很乐意镇压任何在祖国有一点重要性的人。所以他是这份工作的最佳人选。

To replace Iagoda, Stalin chose Nicolai Ivanovitch Yejov, former political commissar of the Red Army, then member of the Central Committee of the Party. Appointed head of the Party cadre division, Yejov was soon elected a member of the Central Committee and liaison officer between the Politburo and the Security. But, despite all these honors, Yejov still suffers from his poor childhood and his lack of education. He hates the intelligentsia and anyone who stands out. This includes many Bolsheviks, creators of the new order. Stalin is aware of this hatred and firmly believes that Yejov will happily suppress anyone who has had a little importance in the motherland. So he is the man for the job.

1936年9月25日，斯大林与日丹诺夫在索契的夏宫向卡冈诺维奇、莫洛托夫和政治局其他成员发出了以下电报：

On September 25, 1936, from his summer residence in Sochi, Stalin, together with Zhdanov, sent Kaganovich, Molotov and other members of the Politburo the following telegram:

我们认为任命叶若夫同志担任内务人民委员是绝对必要和紧迫的。亚戈达明确地表明，他无法揭穿托洛茨基主义-季诺维埃主义集团的面具。GPU在这件事上落后了四年。所有武装分子和内务人民委员部26的大多数代表都注意到了这一点。

We consider it absolutely necessary and urgent that Comrade Yezhov be appointed to the post of People's Commissar for Internal Affairs. Yagoda has definitely demonstrated that he was incapable of unmasking the Trotskyist-Zinovietist bloc. The GPU is four years behind in this matter. This was noticed by all the militants and by the majority of the representatives of the NKVD 26 .

该命令发出后，根里克·亚戈达立即被解除职务，由尼古拉·伊万诺维奇·叶约夫接替。

Immediately after this order, Genrikh Yagoda was relieved of his duties and replaced by Nikolai Ivanovitch Yejov.

新任安全局局长非常清楚他的任命意味着什么。立即，一波逮捕浪潮席卷了莫斯科。在很短的时间内，数百名最杰出的布尔什维克，列宁在新祖国建设中的前合作者，被俘虏。

The new head of the Sûreté knows perfectly well what his appointment means. Immediately, a wave of arrests overwhelmed Moscow. In a short time, hundreds of the most eminent Bolsheviks, former collaborators of Lenin in the construction of the new fatherland, were taken prisoner.

斯大林计划在几周内返回克里姆林宫。但是，十月初，贝利亚从第比利斯打电话给她母亲。老叶卡捷琳娜·乔治维娜·朱加什维利去世了。葬礼对于首都格鲁吉亚人来说是一个重要的仪式，贝利亚对他们进行了正式哀悼。学校、工厂和商店仍然关闭，学童、学生和教师必须点燃蜡烛跟随灵车。

Stalin plans to return to the Kremlin in a few weeks. But, in the first days of October, Beria telephoned from Tbilisi to call her to her mother. Old Ekaterina Georgievina Dzhugashvili is dead. The funeral is an important ceremony for the Georgians of the capital, on whom Beria imposes an official mourning. Schools, factories and shops remain closed, while school children, students and teachers must follow the hearse with lit candles.

斯大林的孩子雅科夫、瓦西里和斯维特兰娜从莫斯科抵达。年轻人是贝利亚的客人，住在他位于住宅区的豪华公寓里。来自莫斯科的还有斯瓦尼泽家族、阿利卢耶夫家族以及朋友们，特别是《消息报》主编布哈林、马林科夫、布尔加宁、赫鲁晓夫、卡冈诺维奇、莫洛托夫、米高扬和奥尔忠尼启则。

Stalin's children, Yakov, Vassili and Svetlana, arrive from Moscow. The young people are Beria's guests and stay in his luxurious apartment in the residential area. From Moscow also come the Svanidzes, the Alliluyevs, as well as friends, notably Bukharin, editor of Izvestia , Malenkov, Bulganin, Khrushchev, Kaganovitch, Molotov, Mikoyan and Ordzhonikidze.

约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇走近母亲打开的棺材，亲吻她的额头和脸颊，他真诚而深深地感动，尽管他没有像在基洛夫葬礼上那样夸张地流泪。

As he approaches his mother's open coffin and kisses her forehead and cheeks, Iosif Vissarionovitch is sincerely and deeply moved, although he does not shed tears as he so ostentatiously did at the funeral. of Kirov.

仪式结束后，亲朋好友立即返回莫斯科，其中包括马林科夫。后者带着斯大林主要助手日丹诺夫的特别指示回来了。

Immediately after the ceremony, relatives and friends return to Moscow, as well as the personalities among whom is Malenkov. The latter returns with special instructions given by Zhdanov, Stalin's main assistant.

布哈林在编辑部工作时立即被捕，根据叶约夫的明确命令，他被关押在莫斯科附近最安全的监狱：莱福尔托沃监狱。

Bukharin was immediately arrested while working in his editorial office and, on the express order of Yejov, he was imprisoned in the safest prison in the vicinity of Moscow: Lefortovo.

第二天，独裁者带着伊丹诺夫和他的保镖弗拉西克将军返回索契。他带着两个孩子瓦西里和斯维特兰娜，但没有雅科夫。他永远无法忍受。

The next day, the dictator returned to Sochi with Jdanov and his bodyguard, General Vlasik. He takes with him two of his children Vassili and Svetlana but not Iakov. He could never bear it.

拉夫连季·贝利亚（Lavrenty Beria）也加入了他们的行列，他是这个家族最好的朋友，也是领袖斯大林大同志最忠实的追随者。

They are joined by Lavrenty Beria, the family's best friend and most loyal follower of the leader, Grand Comrade Stalin.

评级

Ratings

26 . 1956年2月25日，尼基塔·赫鲁晓夫在苏共第二十次 代表大会（巴黎，1970年）上提交了关于斯大林的秘密报告。

26 . Nikita Khrushchev's secret report on Stalin presented on February 25, 1956 at the 20th Congress  of the CPSU (Paris, 1970).

第26章

Chapter 26

《亲爱的塞尔戈》安魂曲

Requiem for "Dear Sergo"

叶约夫发起的新一波清洗尚未影响到奥尔忠尼启则，这阻碍了贝利亚的前进道路。拉夫伦蒂决定再次追捕“亲爱的塞尔戈”。然而，他觉得这一次他必须比以往更加小心，因为极其可疑的斯大林可能会嗅到一个旨在促进拉夫连季崛起的阴谋。这将面临结束贝利亚职业生涯的风险，因为这位伟大的独裁者会像摧毁他的许多直属下属一样进行毁灭。

The new wave of purges, undertaken by Yejov, did not yet affect Ordzhonikidze, which obstructed Beria's path. Lavrenti decides to go after “dear Sergo” once again. He feels, however, that this time he must be more careful than ever, as Stalin, who is extremely suspicious, might smell a plot aimed at nothing other than facilitating Lavrenti's rise. It would risk ending Beria's career as the great dictator would destroy just as he destroyed many of his immediate subordinates.

编织针对格里戈里·奥尔忠尼启则的阴谋需要贝利亚几天的研究和不眠之夜。最后，拉夫伦蒂设置了一个巧妙的陷阱，这对作者来说同时也是最安全的。再过几个月，奥尔忠尼启则就五十岁了。由于他是重工业人民委员，而且是斯大林的正式朋友，他的生日肯定会举行全国性的庆祝活动。贝利亚决定撰写并发表一篇长文，赞扬奥尔忠尼启则，他被描述为守旧派中最杰出的布尔什维克之一，同时也是伟大的斯大林的一位有能力和忠诚的弟子。通过这一策略，拉夫伦蒂将避免被误认为是一位将某人置于比大老板更高的地位的作家。相反：贝利亚，通过找到一种新的方式来表达他对伟大天才斯大林的钦佩，将会引起领导人对奥尔忠尼启则的所有愤怒，因为奥尔忠尼启则本应声称分享独裁者的桂冠。贝利亚将在工作中提醒他的上级，奥尔忠尼启则是另一位著名的格鲁吉亚人，他为革命的成功做出了很多贡献，他是斯大林当之无愧的同时代人之一。其中一位独裁者闻不到的人。

Weaving the plot against Grigori Ordzhonikidze requires Beria several days of research and sleepless nights. Finally, Lavrenti lays a clever trap which is at the same time the safest for its author. In a few months, Ordzhonikidze will be fifty years old. As he is the People's Commissar for Heavy Industry and, officially, an excellent friend of Stalin, his birthday will certainly be marked by a national ceremony. Beria decides to write and publish a long essay in praise of Ordzhonikidze presented as one of the most eminent Bolsheviks of the old guard, but also as a competent and devoted disciple of the great Stalin. By this stratagem, Lavrenti will avoid passing for an author who would place someone higher than the big boss. On the contrary: Beria, by finding a new way to express his admiration for the great genius Stalin, will draw all the wrath of the leader on Ordjonikidze supposed to claim to share the laurels of the dictator. In his work, Beria will remind his superior that Ordzhonikidze is another famous Georgian, that he contributed a lot to the success of the revolution and that he is one of Stalin's deserving contemporaries. And one of those people the dictator can't smell.

1936 年 10 月 28 日出现在《真理报》上题为《列宁、斯大林党事业的英勇战士》的文章。开头是一句欢快的话：“奥尔忠尼启则同志五十岁了！这段论述几乎占据了整个第二页，并附有格里戈里·康斯坦丁诺维奇（又名“谢尔戈”·奥尔忠尼启则）的大幅照片。标题上方有下划线，作者姓名：Lavrenti Beria。在这篇对斯大林的天才的赞颂和对奥尔忠尼启则的悼词中，莫斯科人可以读到这样的陈述：“奥尔忠尼启则同志正在庆祝他的五十岁生日，他将自己的三十五年的生命奉献给了‘人民的英勇革命斗争’。”工人阶级”。或者：“谢尔戈同志的第一位导师和导师是革命马克思列宁主义的创造者，格鲁吉亚和外高加索布尔什维克党的创始人，伟大的斯大林。经过这样的介绍，贝利亚可以强调，“在沙皇时期，谢尔戈同志是布尔什维克党的建设者之一，他的功绩使他在布尔什维克老卫队的杰出战士中占有一席之地”。正如贝利亚正确计算的那样，这样一个专横而令人印象深刻的句子一定会在奥尔忠尼启泽的棺材上钉上一颗钉子，而不是促使斯大林亲手授予“亲爱的谢尔戈”称号。他的功绩使他在布尔什维克老卫士的杰出战士中赢得了一席之地”。正如贝利亚正确计算的那样，这样一个专横而令人印象深刻的句子一定会在奥尔忠尼启泽的棺材上钉上一颗钉子，而不是促使斯大林亲手授予“亲爱的谢尔戈”称号。他的功绩使他在布尔什维克老卫士的杰出战士中赢得了一席之地”。正如贝利亚正确计算的那样，这样一个专横而令人印象深刻的句子一定会在奥尔忠尼启泽的棺材上钉上一颗钉子，而不是促使斯大林亲手授予“亲爱的谢尔戈”称号。

October 28, 1936 appears in Pravdaan article entitled "A valiant fighter for the cause of the Party of Lenin and Stalin". It begins with a joyful sentence: “Comrade Ordzhonikidze is fifty years old! The lucubration, which takes up almost the entire second page, is illustrated with a large photograph of Grigory Konstantinovich, aka "Sergo" Ordzhonikidze. Above the title appears, underlined, the name of the author: Lavrenti Beria. In this panegyric of the genius of Stalin and in this eulogy of Ordzhonikidze, Muscovites can read statements of this kind: "Comrade Ordzhonikidze, who is celebrating his fiftieth birthday, has devoted thirty-five years of his life 'to the heroic revolutionary struggle of the working class”. Or: "Comrade Sergo's first master and teacher was the creator of revolutionary Marxism-Leninism, the founder of the Bolshevik Party of Georgia and Transcaucasia, the great Stalin. After such an introduction, Beria can emphasize that "during the tsarist period, comrade Sergo was one of the builders of the Bolshevik party, and that his merit earned him a place among the eminent fighters of the Bolshevik old guard". Such a peremptory and impressive sentence must, as Beria correctly calculates, serve to drive a nail in Ordzhonikidze's coffin more than it must incite Stalin to bestow a distinction on "dear Sergo" with his own hands. and that his merit earned him a place among the eminent fighters of the Bolshevik old guard”. Such a peremptory and impressive sentence must, as Beria correctly calculates, serve to drive a nail in Ordzhonikidze's coffin more than it must incite Stalin to bestow a distinction on "dear Sergo" with his own hands. and that his merit earned him a place among the eminent fighters of the Bolshevik old guard”. Such a peremptory and impressive sentence must, as Beria correctly calculates, serve to drive a nail in Ordzhonikidze's coffin more than it must incite Stalin to bestow a distinction on "dear Sergo" with his own hands.

这篇文章以及整个情节都是背信弃义的真正杰作。读完贝利亚的咆哮后，斯大林对奥尔忠尼启则非常愤怒，以至于他放弃了授予谢尔戈列宁勋章的打算，这种勋章通常是在臭名昭著的布尔什维克成立五十周年之际授予的。

The article, as well as the plot as a whole, is a real masterpiece of perfidy. After reading Beria's rantings, Stalin was so angry with Ordzhonikidze that he renounced his intention to award Sergo the Order of Lenin, a decoration usually bestowed on notorious Bolsheviks on the occasion of their fiftieth anniversary.

1936年12月6日，斯大林宪法正式颁布，前一天进行了投票。对于获得“世界上最民主权利法案”的国家来说，这是一次盛大的庆祝活动。新宪法承诺人民享有言论自由、新闻自由、议事自由、集会自由和示威自由。

On December 6, 1936, Stalin's constitution was officially promulgated, the vote having taken place the day before. It's a big celebration for the nation that receives “the most democratic bill of rights in the world”. The new constitution promises the people freedom of expression in the form of freedom of the press, deliberation, assembly and demonstration.

事实上，每个人都认为这些自由仅限于根据苏联领导人的利益进行思考的自由，而这种自由受到苏联秘密警察的严密保护。

In truth, everyone feels that these freedoms are limited to the freedom to think in accordance with the interests of the leaders of the USSR, which is well guarded by its secret police.

在将苏联转变为人间天堂的新宪法下，分裂主义团体没有容身之所。换句话说，像外高加索联邦苏维埃社会主义共和国这样的组织必须自行决定其存在对于高加索人民的福祉是否必要。1936年12月27日，三个高加索民族的代表大会在巴库召开。会议在阿塞拜疆共产党中央委员会大楼内举行，该大楼位于市中心，距离宽阔的大街不远最近更名为基洛夫大道。老高加索布尔什维克，那些为将外高加索地区从资本主义的魔掌中解放出来而奋斗的人，正在发言。他们就是优秀的阿纳斯塔斯·米高扬和谢尔戈·奥尔忠尼启则同志。格鲁吉亚代表包括查尔克维亚尼、巴克拉泽和德卡诺佐夫。代表团由拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇·贝利亚率领。

Under the new constitution which is transforming the USSR into an earthly paradise, there is no place for separatist groups. In other words, an organization like the Transcaucasian Federated Soviet Socialist Republic must decide for itself whether or not its existence is necessary for the welfare of the peoples of the Caucasus. A convention of the representatives of the three Caucasian nations is convened in Baku on December 27, 1936. The meeting is held in the buildings of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Azerbaijan, located in the city center, not far from a wide avenue recently renamed Kyrov Avenue. The old Caucasian Bolsheviks, those who fought to free Transcaucasia from the clutches of capitalism, take the floor. They are the excellent comrades Anastase Mikoyan and Sergo Ordzhonikidze. Among the Georgian delegates are Tcharkviani, Bakradze and Dekanozov. The delegation is led by Lavrenti Pavlovich Beria.

经过三天针对新形势的辩论和讨论，大会于 1936 年 12 月 30 日一致投票决定解体外高加索联邦。阿塞拜疆、格鲁吉亚和亚美尼亚作为独立的共和国并入苏联。不仅这次表决是一致通过的，而且还一致向高加索的宠儿斯大林同志发电报，请他欢迎这三个国家加入苏维埃共和国大家庭。

After three days of debates and discussions devoted to the new situation, the assembly voted unanimously, on December 30, 1936, the dismemberment of the Transcaucasian Federation. Azerbaijan, Georgia and Armenia are incorporated into the USSR as separate republics. Not only is this vote obtained unanimously, but unanimity is also achieved on the sending of a telegram to Comrade Stalin, the darling son of the Caucasus, asking him to welcome the three countries into the family of republics Soviets.

贝利亚毫不怀疑，这一决定是在他作为高加索内务人民委员会主席和马林科夫抵达巴库所施加的压力下做出的。据说这个人来自莫斯科，是一名观察员。主席团成员包括米高扬和奥尔忠尼启则，两人对巴库和格鲁吉亚的残酷血腥屠杀负有责任。他们的存在也非常重要。

Beria has no doubt that the decision was obtained under the pressure exerted by his presence as head of the Caucasian NKVD and by Malenkov's arrival in Baku. This one came from Moscow supposedly as an observer. The Presidium includes Mikoyan and Ordzhonikidze, the two responsible for the ruthless bloodbath in Baku and Georgia. Their presence is also very significant.

现在贝利亚正计划在外高加索进行新的清洗。他知道，如果他不消灭所有相信自己国家共产主义的好处，但拒绝成为克里姆林宫附庸的想法的高加索布尔什维克，他将永远不会成为斯大林在莫斯科的副手。

Now Beria is planning a new purge in Transcaucasia. He knows that if he does not liquidate all the Caucasian Bolsheviks who believe in the benefits of communism in their own country, but who reject the idea of ​​becoming vassals of the Kremlin, he will never become Stalin's deputy in Moscow.

所有白人共产党领导人都是民族主义者，这已不是什么秘密。这种观点在苏联是不合适的。这些人必须被消灭。然而，贝利亚明白，当高加索最杰出的人物之一仍然拥有他的全部权力时，从爪牙入手是有风险的。因此，贝利亚决定让斯大林相信让谢尔戈·奥尔忠尼启则继续担任职务会带来巨大的危险。

It is no secret that all Caucasian communist leaders are nationalists. Such a view is out of place in the Soviet Union. These men must be destroyed. Beria understands, however, that it would be risky to start with the minions when one of the most eminent personalities of the Caucasus still has all his powers. Consequently, Beria decides to convince Stalin of the great danger there would be in leaving Sergo Ordzhonikidze in his post.

俄罗斯新年后不久，贝利亚前往莫斯科，并在独裁者位于昆采沃的别墅里度过了两天的假期，与独裁者聊天。贝利亚提醒他的老板，由于奥尔忠尼启则胆敢反抗斯大林，为他的门徒、最近被捕的前重工业政委格里戈里·皮达科夫辩护，而且他经常在监狱里探望他，因此他犯下了所有针对苏联工业犯下的罪行。皮达科夫。削弱工业生产力的犯罪行为相当于破坏行为。这是针对国家、针对政府的行为，最终是针对斯大林的犯罪行为。

Shortly after the Russian New Year, Beria travels to Moscow and spends two days off chatting with the dictator at his dacha in Kuntsevo. Beria reminds his boss that since Ordzhonikidze dared to contradict Stalin by defending his protege, the recently arrested former Commissar of Heavy Industry, Grigory Pyatakov, and since he visits him frequently in prison, he is guilty of all the crimes committed against Soviet industry by Pyatakov. And the crime of weakening industrial productivity is comparable to sabotage. It is an act directed against the country, against the government and, ultimately, a crime against Stalin.

另一方面，贝利亚认为，只要奥尔忠尼启则还活着，就很难攻破外高加索统治者的堡垒，因为许多人民委员都是谢尔戈的手下。

On the other hand, reasons Beria, as long as Ordzhonikidze remains alive, it will be difficult to break the citadel of the Transcaucasian rulers, since many of the people's commissars are Sergo's men.

拉夫伦蒂回到第比利斯，确信“亲爱的塞尔戈”的日子已经屈指可数了。这符合他的个人计划，因为他知道奥尔忠尼启泽对贝利亚担任外高加索委员会第一书记提出了某些反对意见，并且他希望看到他的同志卡特维利奇维利担任这一职务。他迟早会试图阻碍贝利亚在莫斯科的职业生涯。此外，正是奥尔忠尼启泽打断了贝利亚的建筑研究，任命他的间谍斯涅戈夫为拉夫连季在阿塞拜疆的第二把手，然后在贝利亚被斯大林任命后推迟了前往巴库的调动。由于这些原因，奥尔忠尼启则必须受到惩罚。

Lavrenti returns to Tbilisi with the certainty that the days of "dear Sergo" are numbered. This suits his personal plans, since he knows that Ordzhonikidze raises certain objections against the presence of Beria as first secretary of the Transcaucasian Committee and that he wishes to see his comrade Kartvelichvili in this post. Sooner or later he will seek to hinder Beria's career in Moscow. Furthermore, it was Ordzhonikidze who interrupted Beria's architectural studies, appointed his spy Snegov as Lavrenti's second in Azerbaijan, and then delayed Beria's transfer to Baku after his appointment by Stalin. For these reasons, Ordzhonikidze must be punished.

1937 年 1 月 23 日，奥尔忠尼启则的副手格里戈里·列昂尼多维奇·皮亚塔科夫 (Grigory Leonidovitch Piatakov) 被带上法庭。陪同他的有七位杰出的布尔什维克：内战英雄米哈伊尔·博古斯拉夫斯基和雅科夫·德罗布尼斯，前铁路副专员兼南方铁路总监雅科夫·利夫奇茨，前红军监察长和前莫斯科军政府总监尼古拉·莫拉洛夫，著名记者、《消息报》社长卡尔·拉德克（Karl Radek）、前财政专员兼驻伦敦大使格里戈里·索科尔尼科夫（Grigori Sokolnikov）和前交通专员列昂尼德·谢列布里亚科夫（Leonid Serebriakov）参与了斯大林新宪法草案的起草工作。还有其他九名不太重要的被告。

On January 23, 1937, Ordzhonikidze's deputy, Grigory Leonidovitch Piatakov was brought before a court. Seven eminent Bolsheviks accompanied him: Mikhaïl Bogouslavski and Iakov Drobnis, heroes of the civil war, Iakov Lifchitz, former Deputy Commissioner of Railways and director of the Southern Railways, Nikolai Mouralov, former Inspector General of the Red Army and former military governor of Moscow, Karl Radek, a prominent journalist, director of Izvestia , who collaborated on Stalin's draft of the new constitution, Grigori Sokolnikov, former finance commissioner and ambassador to London, and Leonid Serebriakov, former transport commissioner . There are still nine other accused of lesser importance.

皮达科夫被指控破坏铁路、煤炭和化学工业。苏联总检察长安德烈·维辛斯基代表检察部门。审判持续7天。1937年1月30日作出判决。法院对皮亚塔科夫和其他被告判处死刑，但拉狄克和谢列布里亚科夫被判处在西伯利亚十年强迫劳动。

Pyatakov is accused of sabotaging the railways and the coal and chemical industries. The Prosecutor General of the USSR, Andrei Vyshinsky, represents the prosecution service. The trial lasts seven days. The verdict was given on January 30, 1937. The court voted death for Piatakov and for the other defendants, with the exception of Radek and Serebriakov sentenced to ten years of forced labor in Siberia.

审判一结束，奥尔忠尼启则就去找斯大林，请求赦免忠诚的共产主义者皮达科夫同志。他祈祷自己能幸免于难。独裁者回答说，这对苏联司法的威信来说将是灾难性的，由于新宪法，苏联司法现在不受任何旨在影响其决定的外部干预的影响。所有苏联公民在法律面前一律平等。任何人都不应享有特殊特权或优惠。

As soon as the trial was over, Ordjonikidze went to Stalin to ask for the pardon of the devoted communist, comrade Pyatakov. He prays for his life to be spared. The dictator replies that it would be disastrous for the prestige of Soviet justice which, thanks to the new constitution, is now free and independent of any attempt at outside intervention aimed at influencing its decisions. All Soviet citizens are equal before the law. No one should enjoy special privileges or favors.

被判处死刑的人于当晚被处决。

The condemned are executed the same night.

奥尔忠尼启则副政委皮达科夫被判处死刑，意味着他的领导人和保护者的垮台。奥尔忠尼启则完全意识到这一点，因为几个月前，皮达科夫入狱后，谢尔戈立即向斯大林辩护，而索索则向“亲爱的谢尔戈”保证，他的门徒不会被送去行刑队。

The death sentence pronounced against Pyatakov, Deputy Commissar Ordzhonikidze, means the downfall of his leader and protector. Ordzhonikidze is fully aware of this because several months earlier, immediately after Pyatakov's imprisonment, Sergo had pleaded his case to Stalin and Soso had promised "dear Sergo" that his protege would not be sent to a firing squad. .

两周后，当奥尔忠尼启则仍是政治局委员时，他在担任重工业人民委员的办公室里工作到很晚——正如他经常做的那样——内务人民委员部官员进入了他的私人公寓。他们禁止他的妻子齐娜伊达给丈夫打电话并进行搜查。他们翻转床垫并没收私人信件、笔记、家庭照片和文件。

Two weeks later, while Ordzhonikidze, still a member of the Politburo, worked late in his office as People's Commissar for Heavy Industry – as he often does – NKVD officials entered his private apartment. They forbid his wife Zinaïda to telephone her husband and undertake to search the premises. They turn over mattresses and confiscate personal letters, notes, family photographs and documents.

奥尔忠尼启则回到家后，试图给斯大林打电话，但没有成功。他只到达了叶乔夫。他愤怒地斥责他。当然，这是一种无奈之举。该事件并未向公众公布。但贝利亚了解到这一点并认识到现在是积极干预的时候了。

When Ordzhonikidze returns home, he tries to telephone Stalin but in vain. He only manages to reach Yejov. He scolds him furiously. Certainly, this is an act of desperation. The event is not made known to the public. But Beria learns of this and recognizes that the time has come to actively intervene.

1937 年 2 月 17 日，“亲爱的塞尔戈”与索索进行了一次长时间的私人谈话。讨论是友好的，这适合两个相识已久的同志之间，也适合两个来自他们如此亲爱的格鲁吉亚的同胞之间。然后，Sergo 返回办公室，工作到凌晨两点。

On February 17, 1937, “dear Sergo” had a long personal conversation with Soso. The discussion is friendly, as befits between two comrades who have been seeing each other for so long and between two compatriots from this Georgia that is so dear to them. Then, Sergo returns to his office where he works until two in the morning.

当他回到家时，两名内务人民委员部高级官员正在等他。他们要求能够在他妻子不在场的情况下在他的办公室里与他说几句话。第二天，奥尔忠尼启则没有去他的办公室，而是试图给斯大林同志打电话。不幸的是，独裁者遥不可及。随后，谢尔戈接待了斯大林的私人秘书兼特别任务助理亚历山大·波斯克列比切夫（Alexander Poskrebychev）的来访。格里戈里·康斯坦丁诺维奇·奥尔忠尼启则不久后去世。他的遗孀齐娜伊达给斯大林打电话，斯大林立即赶到。四位医生：卫生人民委员 G. Kaminski、克里姆林宫医疗服务处主任 I. Khodorovski、克里姆林宫医疗服务处顾问 L. Levine 和 S. Mets，克里姆林宫诊所的医生进行了快速尸检，并出具了一份签名报告，得出心脏麻痹的结论。第二天晚上，在第比利斯，奥尔忠尼启则的哥哥谢尔戈-帕普利，一位著名的格鲁吉亚布尔什维克，被贝利亚秘密逮捕，遭受了几个小时的审讯和酷刑，然后被枪杀。27 .

When he returns home, two senior NKVD officers are waiting for him. They ask to be able to say a few words to him in his office, without his wife being present. The next day Ordzhonikidze does not go to his office, but tries to telephone Comrade Stalin. Unfortunately, the dictator is out of reach. Later, Sergo receives a visit from Alexander Poskrebychev, Stalin's private secretary and his assistant for special missions. Grigory Konstantinovich Ordzhonikidze dies immediately afterwards. His widow Zinaïda phones Stalin who arrives immediately. Four doctors G. Kaminski, People's Commissar of Health, I. Khodorovski, Director of the Kremlin Medical Service, L. Levine, Adviser of the Kremlin Medical Service, and S. Mets, doctor attached to the Kremlin clinic carried out a quick autopsy and produced a signed report concluding that there was paralysis of the heart. The following night in Tbilisi, Ordzhonikidze's older brother, Sergo-Papuli, a prominent Georgian Bolshevik, was secretly arrested by Beria, subjected to several hours of interrogation and torture, and then shot.27 .

第二天，即2月19日，《真理报》在头版转载了一张斯大林、莫洛托夫、日丹诺夫、米高扬和其他同志站在奥尔忠尼启则灵柩前的照片。所有人都感到深深的悲痛。

The next day, February 19, Pravda reproduced on its front page a photograph showing Stalin, Molotov, Zhdanov, Mikoyan and other comrades standing in front of Ordzhonikidze's coffin. All feel deep sorrow.

在伟大的、令人难忘的“亲爱的谢尔戈”的葬礼结束后，贝利亚赶紧向斯大林表明，任何怀疑奥尔忠尼启则死因并胆敢散布谣言的人都将被清算。格鲁吉亚专员米尔扎别基安 (Mirzabekian) 是塞尔戈-帕普利·奥尔乔尼启泽 (Sergo-Papouli Ordjonikidze) 的亲密合作者，有一天从他的办公室消失了。他被带到梅泰克希城堡的监狱，并于夜间在地窖中被枪杀。随后，贝利亚将签署对格瓦卡里亚的逮捕令，格瓦卡里亚是格鲁吉亚庞大钢铁工业的活跃且当之无愧的组织者、推动者和管理者。经过由贝利亚亲自领导的小组进行的长时间酷刑后，这位与拉夫连季多年的密友的囚犯被带到地下室并被枪杀。

After the funeral of the great, unforgettable "dear Sergo", Beria hastened to show Stalin that anyone who doubted the cause of Ordzhonikidze's death, and dared to spread rumors about it, would be liquidated. The Georgian commissioner Mirzabekian, a close collaborator of Sergo-Papouli Ordjonikidzé, disappears one day from his office. He is taken to the prison of the castle of Metekhi and shot at night, in the cellars. Later Beria will sign an arrest warrant against Gvakharia, an active and deserving organizer, promoter and administrator of the huge Georgian steel industry. After a prolonged torture session, administered by a team personally led by Beria, the prisoner, who had been a close friend of Lavrenti for several years, is taken to the basement and shot.

巧合的是，Gvakharia 是已故塞尔戈的侄子。

Coincidentally, Gvakharia is the late Sergo's nephew.

几天之内，三名被处决者的家人、他们的一些同伴以及直接下属被贝利亚逮捕，并消失在第比利斯奥尔金斯卡亚街国家监狱的铁窗后面。

Within days, the families of the three executed men, some of their companions, as well as immediate subordinates were arrested by Beria and disappeared behind the bars of the state prison on Olginskaya Street in Tbilisi.

评级

Ratings

27 . 1956年2月25日，尼基塔·赫鲁晓夫在苏共第二十次代表大会（巴黎，1970年）上提交了关于斯大林的秘密报告。

27 . Nikita Khrushchev's secret report on Stalin presented on February 25, 1956 at the 20th Congress of the CPSU (Paris, 1970).

第27章

Chapter 27

共产主义实践教师

The teachers of practical communism

1935 年 7 月 21 日至 22 日，在第比利斯举行的党的工作人员会议上，贝利亚发表了令人难忘且具有里程碑意义的讲话，当时捍卫外高加索联邦，指责马米亚·奥拉赫拉什维利、菲利普·马哈拉泽和其他高加索布尔什维克的民族主义偏差主义。拉夫伦蒂攻击他们是因为他们之前反对联邦。

In the memorable and monumental speech delivered at the July 21-22, 1935 meeting of Party functionaries in Tbilisi, Beria, then defending the Transcaucasian Federation, accused Mamia Orakhelashvili, Philip Makharadze and other Caucasian Bolsheviks of nationalist deviationism. Lavrenti had attacked them because they had previously opposed the Federation.

事实上，在1922年3月之前，这群格鲁吉亚共产党人就反对联邦，因为他们担心自己的国家会在三个民族的合并中失去民族特征。相反，他们建议每个国家分别与苏联联合。

In fact, before March 1922, this group of Georgian communists was against the Federation, for they feared that their country would lose its national character in the amalgamation of the three nations. Instead, they suggested that each of the nations be united separately with the USSR.

作为自豪的格鲁吉亚人，他们希望自己的国家能够作为正式成员加入共产主义共和国联盟，并拥有自己的旗帜。然而，民族主义思想虽然被列宁所接受，但却与斯大林、捷尔任斯基和奥尔忠尼启则所代表的强硬路线背道而驰。没有任何形式的民族主义的空间。但自从最近的宪法颁布以来，时代已经发生了变化。不再存在任何单独的联邦、在国中组建国家的问题。1936年12月30日，当三个高加索国家的代表在巴库决定解散联邦时，老摔跤手姆迪瓦尼和他的战友们的梦想似乎已经实现。但这只是表象。事实上，这是一个陷阱。这三个国家只不过是巨大机器中的微小齿轮，只能通过名字来辨认，就像是没有任何意义的木偶。他们在苏联的作用将被削弱。他们只不过是苦苦劳作的附庸，为俄罗斯提供来自格鲁吉亚的小麦、水果和葡萄酒，来自阿塞拜疆的石油和来自亚美尼亚的棉花，这对高加索人民造成了损害。

As proud Georgians, they preferred their country to join the Union of Communist Republics as a full member, with its own flag. The idea of ​​nationalism however, although accepted by Lenin, was contrary to the hard line represented by Stalin, Dzerzhinsky and Ordzhonikidze. There was no room for any form of nationalism. But since the recent constitution, times have changed. There is no longer any question of a separate Federation, forming a State within a State. When, on December 30, 1936, the delegates of the three Caucasian nations decided in Baku to dismantle the Federation, it seemed that the dream of the old wrestlers, Mdivani and his comrades, had come true. But this is only an apprearance. In fact, it's a trap. The three countries will be nothing more than tiny cogs in the enormous machine, recognizable only by their name, sort of puppets devoid of meaning. Their role in the USSR will be reduced to nothing. They will be nothing more than vassals slaving away to supply Russia with wheat, fruit and wine from Georgia, oil from Azerbaijan and cotton from Armenia to the detriment of the peoples of the Caucasus.

老布尔什维克感受到了这一点。但他们不能投票维持现状并避免被苏联吞并。他们感到被束缚，因为几年前，当他们激烈捍卫同样的想法时，贝利亚指责他们犯有“民族主义偏差主义”。再加上他们身居政委的高位，所以他们知道克里姆林宫做出的有利于苏联整个国家的决定总是正确的。现在，如果他们在接受莫斯科的建议时表现出任何犹豫，他们就会再次以格鲁吉亚民族主义者的身份出现，事实上，尽管他们持有共产主义观点，但他们确实是格鲁吉亚民族主义者。他们觉得他们的高加索民族正在失去最后的独立痕迹。1922年3月12日，斯大林按照自己的想法首先创建了三个独立的外高加索共和国联邦，紧接着，同年12月13日，他将三个独立国家的新联邦改造成外高加索联邦，从这三个国家失去了个性，最终并入了苏联。如果斯大林从一开始就这么看的话，那这确实是一个恶毒的犬儒主义阴谋。并入苏联。如果斯大林从一开始就这么看的话，那这确实是一个恶毒的犬儒主义阴谋。并入苏联。如果斯大林从一开始就这么看的话，那这确实是一个恶毒的犬儒主义阴谋。

The old Bolsheviks feel it. But they cannot vote to maintain the status quo and avoid annexation to the Soviet Union. They feel held because, a few years earlier, when they fiercely defended the same idea, they were then accused of “nationalist deviationism” by Beria. In addition, they occupy high positions as commissars, so they know that the Kremlin is always right when it makes a decision beneficial to the whole country of the Soviets. Now, if they showed any hesitation in accepting Moscow's suggestion, they would again appear as Georgian nationalists, which they are, in fact, despite their communist views. They feel that their Caucasian nation is losing the last traces of its independence. First creating a federation of three separate Transcaucasian republics on March 12, 1922, Stalin followed their own idea, and immediately afterwards, on December 13 of the same year, he remodeled the new federation of the three independent countries into a Transcaucasian Federation, from so that these three countries lost their individuality to be, finally, incorporated into the USSR. If Stalin saw it that way from the start, it was really a plot of diabolical cynicism. incorporated into the USSR. If Stalin saw it that way from the start, it was really a plot of diabolical cynicism. incorporated into the USSR. If Stalin saw it that way from the start, it was really a plot of diabolical cynicism.

在十四年的时间里，高加索地区的共产主义先驱们生活在格鲁吉亚契卡机敏的领导人拉夫连季·巴甫洛维奇·贝利亚的监视之下。贝利亚因在起义后影响了数千名格鲁吉亚人的残酷和血腥的清洗而闻名。 1924年。

For a period of fourteen years, the pioneers of communism in the Caucasus lived under the watchful eye of the adroit leader of the Georgian Cheka , Lavrenty Pavlovich Beria, too famous for the ruthless and bloody purges that affected thousands of Georgians after the uprising. of 1924.

加米涅夫、季诺维也夫等人受审期间，被告之一，亚美尼亚布尔什维克领导人、党报《马克思主义旗帜下》原编辑特尔-瓦加尼安称，一群格鲁吉亚偏差分子计划暗杀斯大林、基洛夫、奥尔忠尼启则、卡冈诺维奇、伏罗希洛夫、贝利亚等政要。泰尔-瓦加尼安只提到了一个名字，即米哈伊尔·奥库贾瓦，但众所周知，格鲁吉亚主要的偏差主义者之一是布杜·姆迪瓦尼。后来，在皮达科夫的审判期间，姆迪瓦尼的名字再次被多次提及，这次是与他涉嫌针对叶若夫和贝利亚的恐怖活动计划有关。虽然这种虚假证言通常是通过对被告人进行酷刑而获得的，而被告人会说出任何安抚酷刑者的话，但贝利亚却抓住了借口，进行了新的大规模逮捕。

During the trial of Kamenev, Zinoviev and others, one of the defendants, Ter-Vaganian, leader of the Armenian Bolsheviks, former editor of the Party newspaper Under the Banner of Marxism, said that a group of Georgian deviationists planned to assassinate Stalin, Kirov, Orzhonikidze, Kaganovich, Voroshilov, Beria and other dignitaries. Ter-Vaganian mentioned only one name, that of Mikhaïl Okudjava, but it is common knowledge that one of the main Georgian deviationists is Boudou Mdivani. Later, during Pyatakov's trial, Mdivani's name was again mentioned several times, this time in connection with his alleged plans for terrorist acts against Yezhov and Beria. Although this kind of false testimony is usually obtained by the torture of defendants who say anything to appease their torturers, Beria seizes the pretext to carry out new mass arrests.

奥尔忠尼启则突然死亡及其父母入狱后，数百名涉嫌民族主义者的人在夜间被捕，装上卡车并被送进监狱。

Immediately after the sudden death of Ordzhonikidze and the imprisonment of his parents, hundreds of people suspected of being nationalists were arrested at night, loaded into trucks and taken to prison.

1937 年 2 月底，贝利亚逮捕了斯大林的儿时好友布杜·姆迪瓦尼 (Boudou Mdivani)，他是一名布尔什维克战士，有一天，他率领一支小分队占领了库塔伊斯 (Koutaïs) 镇。随后，姆迪瓦尼出任格鲁吉亚总理兼人民委员会主席。然而，几年前，他反对斯大林攻击格鲁吉亚民族的残酷方法，并寻求列宁的保护。最重要的是，他完全了解斯大林年轻时在高加索地区的真实活动。他当然记得斯大林根本不是贝利亚在第比利斯演讲中所描述的伟大而光荣的英雄。

Towards the end of February 1937, Beria arrested Boudou Mdivani, a childhood friend of Stalin and a Bolshevik fighter who, one day, at the head of a small detachment, seized the town of Koutaïs. Later, Mdivani became prime minister of Georgia and chairman of the Council of People's Commissars. Years earlier, however, he had opposed Stalin's brutal methods of attacking the Georgian nation and had sought Lenin's protection. Above all, he knows perfectly the real activities of Stalin during his youth in the Caucasus. He certainly remembers that Stalin was not at all the great and glorious hero described by Beria in his Tbilisi speech.

然后轮到米哈伊尔·奥库德贾瓦被捕了。他是一位不幸受益于托洛茨基友谊的老布尔什维克。然而，斯大林也曾一度是托洛茨基的伙伴。1917年，他们在同一政府共事时。当时斯大林担任民族委员，托洛茨基担任外交委员，职位比约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·朱加什维利高得多。

It is then the turn of Mikhaïl Okoudjava to be arrested. He is an old Bolshevik who had the misfortune to benefit from Trotsky's friendship. Stalin, however, was also, for a time, Trotsky's associate. When they worked together in the same administration in 1917. Stalin was then Commissar for Nationalities, while Trotsky was Commissar for Foreign Affairs, occupying a much higher position in the hierarchy than Iosif Vissarionovich Dzhugashvili.

姆迪瓦尼和奥库德贾瓦在秘密审判中接受审判，即在监狱中受审，因为俄语单词“ kamera”的意思是“牢房”。他们被传唤到秘密警察局长拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇·贝利亚的办公室，在没有经过审判或律师的情况下，他们听取了起诉书。他们根据苏联刑法第 58 条 A、B 和 C 款受到指控。这篇文章将被告描述为“人民的敌人、国家的叛徒、寄生虫”。

Mdivani and Okoudjava are tried in camera , that is to say in prison, because the Russian word kamera means "prison cell". They are summoned to the office of the head of the secret police, Lavrenti Pavlovich Beria, where, without a trial or a lawyer, they hear the indictment. They are charged under Article 58, paragraphs A, B and C of the Soviet criminal code. This article presents the defendant as “an enemy of the people, a traitor to the country and a parasite”.

1937 年 7 月 10 日，尽管米德瓦尼和奥库德贾瓦在最后一次审讯中极力否认，他们还是被判处死刑。他们立即被带到“死亡牢房”并被枪决。

On July 10, 1937, despite their fierce denials during their last interrogation, Midvani and Okoudjava were sentenced to death. They are immediately taken to the "death cell" and shot.

被处决后不久，瓦诺·博尔克瓦泽 (Vano Bolkvadze) 和 A. 库马里安 (A. Khoumarian) 在没有逮捕令的情况下被捕，遭受酷刑，未经审判就被枪杀。他们是老共产主义阴谋家，1902 年在巴库一家地下印刷厂从事版面设计工作。他们将被贝利亚清算，因为他们很清楚，当时阿塞拜疆非法报刊的真正组织者不是斯大林同志，而是阿维尔·叶努基泽。

Shortly after their execution, Vano Bolkvadze and A. Khoumarian were arrested without a warrant, tortured and shot without trial. They are old communist conspirators who, in 1902, worked on the layout in an underground printing house in Baku. They will be liquidated by Beria, because they know very well that at that time the real organizer of the illegal press in Azerbaijan was not comrade Stalin, but Avel Yenukidze.

另一次，五名老人在黎明前被捕，并被带到 Metekhi 28城堡。他们半夜被从床上拖起来，只穿着内衣和一件大衣。

Another time five elderly men were arrested before dawn and taken to the castle of Metekhi 28 . Having been dragged from their beds in the middle of the night, they wear only underwear and an overcoat.

他们在监狱走廊里排成一排，额头靠墙，双手背在身后。

They are lined up in a prison hallway, their foreheads against the wall and their hands behind their backs.

他们一一被叫进了喜欢加班到深夜的外高加索委员会第一书记的办公室。

One by one, they are called into the office of the first secretary of the Transcaucasian Committee, who likes to work late at night.

拉夫连季让每个囚犯坐在办公桌前的椅子上，用平静而温柔的声音给他们朗读斯大林 1926 年向第比利斯铁路工人发表的演讲中的一段话。

Lavrenti makes each of the prisoners sit on a chair in front of his desk and, in a calm and gentle voice, reads to them a passage from a speech given by Stalin to the railway workers of Tiflis in 1926.

贝利亚在其关于外高加索布尔什维克组织的著作中使用了该段落，其表述如下：

The paragraph, which Beria used in his own work on the Bolshevik organizations of Transcaucasia, is formulated as follows:

我记得1898年，我第一次被分配到铁路工人圈子里。那是二十八年前的事了。我记得我是如何在斯图鲁阿同志家里接受实践课程的，当时西尔维斯特·吉布拉泽（他也是我的老师之一）、扎克罗·乔德里奇维利、米科·博乔里奇维利、尼努阿和其他从第比利斯先进来的工人在场。

I remember 1898, when I was first assigned to a circle of railway workers. It was twenty-eight years ago. I remember how I received practical lessons in the house of comrade Stouroua in the presence of Silvester Djibladze at the time he was also one of my masters -, of Zakro Tchodrichvili, of Mikho Botchorichvili, of Ninoua and other workers advanced from Tiflis.

然后贝利亚礼貌地询问听众是否同意这段提到他名字的文本，以及是否接受其内容。没有人拒绝，因为这是事实。有些人高兴地微笑着，自豪地提出详细说明。拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇记录了他们的声明，询问该男子是否已经对亲戚、朋友或邻居说过这种语言，如果是的话，就知道他们的姓名和地址。然后他递给对话者一支笔以签署他的证词。该男子很高兴在这样的声明上签名，他相信这只会给他带来奖励。但事实恰恰相反：声称有人向伟大的斯大林传授共产主义实践是一种犯罪。

Then Beria politely asks the listener if he agrees with this text, in which his name is mentioned, and if he accepts its content. No one refuses, because it's true. Some smile happily and proudly offer to elaborate. Lavrenti Pavlovich takes note of their declarations, inquires whether the man has already spoken this language to relatives, friends or neighbors and, if so, to know their names and addresses. He then hands a pen to his interlocutor to sign his testimony. The man is happy to affix his signature to a declaration of this kind which, he believes, can only bring him a reward. But the opposite is true: to claim that someone taught the practice of communism to the great Stalin is a crime.

在对整个小组进行审问后，这些人被带到地窖，在那里，他们的颈后部被枪杀。

After the whole group has been interrogated, the men are taken to the cellar where, one after another, they are shot in the back of the neck.

一周以来，每天晚上，一辆卡车满载着在家中被捕的人，并由八名手持刺刀的内务人民委员部官员看守，驶入奥尔金斯卡亚街或梅特克希城堡的监狱院子。

Every night for a week, a truck, loaded with people arrested at their homes and guarded by eight NKVD officials armed with bayonet guns, drives into the prison yard on Olginskaya Street or Metekhi Castle.

随即，俘虏们排成一排，额头靠在监狱走廊粉刷成白色的墙壁上，悲惨的闹剧再次开始。这些人被单独叫到贝利亚的办公室。外高加索内务人民委员部领导人礼貌地给他们朗读了他的《历史》中的一段话，就像给孩子讲故事一样。故事内容是这样的：

Immediately, the captives are lined up, their foreheads against the whitewashed wall of the prison corridor, and the tragic farce begins once more. The men are called in isolation to Beria's office. The leader of the Transcaucasian NKVD politely reads them a paragraph from his History , as if telling a tale to a child. The story contains this:

1898年至1900年期间，第比利斯社会民主党中央集团进行了大量的宣传和组织工作，目的是组建一个非法的社会民主党。党中央班子成员开展紧张的革命宣传工作。他们每个人都负责工人学习圈。仅斯大林同志就领导了八个以上的社会民主党工人圈子。

In the period 1898-1900, the central group of the social democrats of Tiflis carried out an enormous work of propaganda and organization with a view to the formation of an illegal social democratic party. The members of the Party's central group carry out intense revolutionary propaganda work. Each of them is responsible for workers' study circles. Comrade Stalin alone leads more than eight social-democratic workers' circles.

1896年和1897年，斯大林同志在第比利斯神学院的学生中领导了两个革命马克思主义圈子。

In 1896 and 1897 Comrade Stalin led two revolutionary Marxist circles among the students of the Tiflis seminary.

第一个革命马克思主义圈子，称为“高级”圈子，是第比利斯神学院的以下学生经常光顾的：……

The first revolutionary Marxist circle, called the “Senior” circle, is frequented by the following students of the Tiflis seminary: …

说到这里，贝利亚明智地停了下来，然后读了大约八个名字29。其中有他的听众的名字。秘密警察负责人随后询问整个故事是否真实准确。他小心翼翼地将受访者提供的细节和修改添加到他的历史记录中，并要求他签名。就这样。调查结束了。这名男子被允许离开黑暗的房间，房间里只有拉夫连蒂·帕夫洛维奇（Lavrenti Pavlovich）桌子上的一盏绿色灯罩的电灯照明，这位优秀的人用格鲁吉亚语与他交谈真是一种乐趣。贝利亚保证，出口问题将在几分钟内得到解决。

Here, Beria pauses sensibly, then reads about eight names 29 . Among them is the name of his listener. The head of the secret police then asks if the story as a whole is true and accurate. He scrupulously adds to his historical records the details and modifications provided by the interviewee, and asks for his signature. That's all. The investigation is over. The man is allowed to leave the dark room, lit only by an electric lamp with a green shade placed on the table of Lavrenti Pavlovich, that excellent man with whom conversation, in Georgian, is a real pleasure. The problem of the exit, ensures Beria, will be solved in a few minutes.

事实上，当另一位老布尔什维克被带到贝利亚的办公室时，审讯结束的那个人被委托给米哈伊尔·穆德里和陪同他下楼的一名军士照顾。他们穿过一楼，走下另一层，进入一条通向几间小牢房的走廊。不久之后，军官和值班中士独自从地窖里出来。

Indeed, when another old Bolshevik is brought into Beria's office, the one whose interrogation is over is entrusted to the good care of Mikhail Moudri and a service sergeant who accompany him downstairs. They go through the ground floor, go down another floor and enter a corridor which leads to a few small cells. Shortly after, the officer and the sergeant on duty come up from the cellar, alone.

被带到地下室的人不明白，通过签署一份声明，表明他们过去曾在所描述的条件下见过斯大林，他们就把自己的名字写在了死刑令的底部。贝利亚和接受采访的人一样清楚，斯大林从未领导过一个社会民主党工人圈子，更不用说八个了。他只是偶尔参加。贝利亚打算消灭所有真相的目击者。

The men taken to the basement did not understand that by signing a statement that they met Stalin in the past and under the conditions described, they put their names on the bottom of a death warrant. Beria knows as well as the people interviewed that Stalin never led a single social-democratic workers' circle, let alone eight of them. He only participated occasionally. And Beria intends to annihilate all witnesses to the truth.

当与第一圈（即“高级”）相关的八名男子被处决后，轮到第二圈（即“初级”圈）的资深阴谋家了。七名共产党员经常光顾这里，并明确提到了名字。然而，其中只有六人被捕30。第七任亚历山大·斯瓦尼泽是斯大林第一任妻子的弟弟，现任莫斯科对外贸易银行行长。

When the eight men associated with the first circle, the "Senior", have been executed comes the turn of the veteran conspirators of the second circle, the "Junior" circle. This was frequented by seven Communists expressly mentioned by name. However, only six of them were arrested 30 . The seventh Alexander Svanidze, brother of Stalin's first wife, heads the Foreign Trade Bank in Moscow.

第三圈的前成员依次受到审问并立即被处决。他们是六位老革命家31。

The former members of the third circle are interrogated in turn and immediately executed. They are six old revolutionaries 31 .

当贝利亚向第四圈的六名前阴谋者32和第五圈的三人33完成他的历史朗读时，天已经快亮了。

It is almost daylight when Beria finishes his historical readings to the six former conspirators of the fourth circle 32 and the three men of the fifth 33 .

在“死亡助理”米哈伊尔·穆德里报告最新的处决事件后不久，佐治亚州秘密警察局长小心翼翼地清理了他的桌子，将他的文件锁在保险箱中，关掉灯，然后离开了办公室。他对自己的成就感到高兴。它的目标是消灭斯大林荣耀的所有可能的竞争对手，即使是最微不足道的。

Shortly after "death assistant" Mikhail Mudri reports on the latest execution, Georgia's secret police chief meticulously cleans his table, locks his files in a safe, turns off the lamp and leaves. office. He is happy with his achievement. Its goal is to liquidate all possible rivals to Stalin's glory, even the most insignificant ones.

拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇坐进他的豪华轿车，命令司机送他回家。他累了，睡着了。他非常渴望在第比利斯的乡间别墅里休息，在那里他与年轻的妻子尼娜和小男孩约瑟夫一起度过了暑假，约瑟夫是为了纪念伟大的同志约瑟夫·斯大林而命名的。

Lavrenti Pavlovich gets into his limousine and orders his driver to take him home. He is tired and falls asleep. He feels a great desire to rest in his country house in Tbilisi, the one where he spends his summer vacation with his young wife Nina and his little boy Joseph, named in honor of Grand Comrade Joseph Stalin.

评级

Ratings

28 . Vano Stouroua、Silvester Djibladzé、Zakro Tchodrichvili、Mikho Botchorichvili 和 G. Ninoua。

28 . Vano Stouroua, Silvester Djibladzé, Zakro Tchodrichvili, Mikho Botchorichvili and G. Ninoua.

29 . Micha Davitachvili（笔名：Davidov）、Artchil Dolidze（笔名：Rostom）、Goutsa Parkadze、Grigori Glouridze、Simon Natrochvili、Gouigo Razmadze、Laddo Akhmetelov 和 Joseph Iremashvili。

29 . Micha Davitachvili (pseudonym: Davidov), Artchil Dolidze (pseudonym: Rostom), Goutsa Parkadze, Grigori Glouridze, Simon Natrochvili, Gouigo Razmadze, Laddo Akhmetelov and Joseph Iremashvili.

30 . Georgi Yelizabedashvili、Dimitri Gourgekhidze、Datiko Souliachvili、Vasso Berdzenichvili、Vano Ketskhoveli 和 D. Oniachvili。

30 . Georgi Yelizabedashvili, Dimitri Gourgekhidze, Datiko Souliachvili, Vasso Berdzenichvili, Vano Ketskhoveli and D. Oniachvili.

31 . D. Gouldedava、Piotr Khourtsilava、K. Chengelia、N. Tomaradzé、R. Stouroua（Vano Stouroua 的兄弟）和 Sandro Merabichvili。

31 . D. Gouldedava, Piotr Khourtsilava, K. Chengelia, N. Tomaradzé, R. Stouroua (brother of Vano Stouroua) and Sandro Merabichvili.

32 . Alexei Zakomoldine、V. Rajanov、Leonti Zolotarev 和 Piotr Montine。

32 . Alexei Zakomoldine, V. Rajanov, Leonti Zolotarev and Piotr Montine.

33 . Dombrovski，Y. Kotchetkov 和 p。斯科罗博加特科。

33 . Dombrovski, Y. Kotchetkov and p. Skorobogatko.

第28章

Chapter 28

有条不紊的杀手

A methodical killer

消除的不仅仅是小鱼苗。在基洛夫、高尔基、加米涅夫、季诺维也夫、奥尔忠尼启则等人被消灭之后，在叶努启则入狱的耻辱之后，我们可以预见老布尔什维克中还有其他受害者。拉夫伦蒂的结论是，为了推进自己的事业，他必须再次清洗外高加索。由于他比斯大林年轻，只要他仍然是消灭不受欢迎的人的工具，他就不怕成为他的受害者。

It's not just small fry to eliminate. After the annihilation of Kirov, Gorky, Kamenev, Zinoviev, Ordzhonikidze and others, after the disgrace of Yenukidze, who is in prison, one can foresee other victims among the old Bolsheviks. Lavrenti concludes that, to advance his own career, he must once again purge Transcaucasia. Being younger than Stalin, he is not afraid of becoming his victim as long as he remains the instrument of the liquidation of the undesirables.

贝利亚在梅特克希城堡的办公室里列出了可能或已经犯下民族主义罪行的人名单。

In his office at Metekhi Castle, Beria draws up lists of people who are likely to commit or have committed the crime of nationalism.

逮捕令发出后，这些人于第二天晚上在家中被捕，并被从床上带走。他们被用有盖卡车或其他车辆送往监狱。为了不引起其他可能躲藏或试图逃跑的政客的怀疑，被捕者会被救护车、邮车送进监狱，如果他们是拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇可能邀请的知名人士，甚至会被送进贝利亚的监狱。豪华轿车。逮捕行动不仅限于第比利斯和格鲁吉亚其他城市。它们也出现在亚美尼亚和阿塞拜疆。然而，所有囚犯都被带到梅泰克希城堡或奥尔金斯卡亚街监狱。

These men are arrested at home the following night, after an arrest warrant has been issued, and taken from their beds. They are driven to the prison in covered trucks or other vehicles. In order not to arouse the suspicions of other politicians who might be hiding or trying to flee, those arrested are taken to prison by ambulance, in a postal van or even, if they are eminent personalities likely to be invited by Lavrenti Pavlovich, in Beria's limousine. Arrests are not limited to Tbilisi and other cities in Georgia. They also occur in Armenia and Azerbaijan. All prisoners, however, were taken to Metekhi Castle or Olginskaya Street Prison.

被监禁的人是最著名的白人布尔什维克。很快，第比利斯两座监狱的牢房里就挤满了名人，如外高加索苏维埃执行委员会主席、两名人民委员会主席和三名人民委员会副主席。

The imprisoned men are among the most notable Caucasian Bolsheviks. Soon the cells of the two Tbilisi prisons are full of personalities such as the chairman of the Executive Committee of the Transcaucasian Soviets, two chairmen of the Councils of People's Commissars and three vice-chairmen of the Councils of People's Commissars.

所有这些囚犯在被拘留后不久将被单独处决。他们被关在牢房里，晚上被单独传唤接受讯问，当他们睡着时，他们不太注意自己的答案。这些问题持续了几个小时。亲自领导调查的拉夫伦蒂·帕夫洛维奇并不着急。他有时间并且喜欢提醒每个受害者囚犯对他造成的最轻微的个人轻视或虐待。当贝利亚还是个新手时，这些人中的每一个在没有邀请拉夫伦蒂的情况下进行的每一次接待，每一个没有得到适当回应的“你好”现在都被囚犯归咎于囚犯。 审判官语气平静，有时甚至微笑。这就是技术学院学生拉夫伦蒂的力量，当他上学并走在巴库的街道上时，他梦想着。世界上没有比聆听这些人的辩护更令人高兴的事情了，他们曾经是重要的、可敬的人物，现在意识到他们的生命受到贝利亚的摆布。他们对自己之前的态度表示遗憾，纠正了他们从未打算造成的冒犯，最后，他们发现自己无法说服施虐者，开始以妻子和孩子的名义恳求怜悯，准备跪在他面前亲吻。他的脚。现在意识到他们的生命受到贝利亚的摆布。他们对自己之前的态度表示遗憾，纠正了他们从未打算造成的冒犯，最后，他们发现自己无法说服施虐者，开始以妻子和孩子的名义恳求怜悯，准备跪在他面前亲吻。他的脚。现在意识到他们的生命受到贝利亚的摆布。他们对自己之前的态度表示遗憾，纠正了他们从未打算造成的冒犯，最后，他们发现自己无法说服施虐者，开始以妻子和孩子的名义恳求怜悯，准备跪在他面前亲吻。他的脚。

All of these prisoners will be individually terminated shortly after being taken into custody. They are kept in their cells and called separately for questioning at night, when, asleep, they pay less attention to their answers. The questions last for hours. Lavrenti Pavlovich, who is leading the investigation himself, is in no hurry. He has time and likes to remind each victim of the smallest personal slights or abuses inflicted on him by the prisoner. Every reception that one of these men gave without inviting Lavrenti there when Beria was only a novice, every "hello" that did not receive a proper response is now blamed on the prisoner by the inquisitor who speaks in a calm voice and sometimes even smiles. Such is the power with which Lavrenti, the student of the Technicum, dreamed when he attended school and walked the streets of Baku. There is no greater pleasure in the world than to listen to the defense of these men, once important, honorable personalities, and now aware that their lives are at the mercy of Beria. They present their regrets for their previous attitude, correct the offenses they never intended to inflict and, finally, seeing that they cannot convince their torturer, they begin to implore mercy from the name of their wife and children, ready to kneel before him and kiss his feet. and now aware that their lives are at the mercy of Beria. They present their regrets for their previous attitude, correct the offenses they never intended to inflict and, finally, seeing that they cannot convince their torturer, they begin to implore mercy from the name of their wife and children, ready to kneel before him and kiss his feet. and now aware that their lives are at the mercy of Beria. They present their regrets for their previous attitude, correct the offenses they never intended to inflict and, finally, seeing that they cannot convince their torturer, they begin to implore mercy from the name of their wife and children, ready to kneel before him and kiss his feet.

对于拉夫伦蒂·贝利亚来说，这是一种无与伦比的快乐，几乎是性的快乐。一个人越是谦卑自己，为他的家人祈祷和恳求同情，他就越谴责自己，因为对于审判者来说，没有什么比消灭一个为亲人折磨自己的人更大的满足了。贝利亚耐心地听受害者说话，让她说话，直到她筋疲力尽，直到她没有什么可透露的，除了重复她的话之外别无他法。然后，外高加索委员会第一秘书、检察官和法官同时向受害者宣布，根据《刑法》第 58 条 A 款，她被指控为“人民的敌人”，并且，由于她的案件尚未结案，她将被召回接受调查。同时，被告人必须在讯问笔录上签字。

It is an incomparable joy, almost sexual, for Lavrenti Beria. The more the man humbles himself, praying and imploring compassion for his family, the more he condemns himself, for, for the inquisitor, there is no greater satisfaction than that of annihilating a man who torments himself for loved ones. Patiently listening to her victim, Beria lets her talk until she is exhausted, until she has nothing more to reveal, nothing more to do but repeat her words. Then, the first secretary of the Transcaucasian Committee, prosecutor and judge at the same time, announces to his victim that she is accused, under article 58, paragraph A of the penal code, of being "an enemy of the people" and that, as her case is not yet closed, she will be called back for investigation. In the meantime, the accused must sign the record of the interrogation.

男子一签字，审讯就结束了。通过签名，囚犯承认自己的错误。报告将指出，被拘留者承认了“人民公敌”的指控。现在，拉夫伦蒂用平静的声音，用最粗鲁的话语压倒了这个人。然后他按响了门铃，命令警卫把囚犯带到“楼下”。这是犯人最后一次行走，因为“楼下”就是“地窖”的意思。

As soon as the man has signed, the interrogation ends. By signing, the prisoner admits his fault. The report will state that the detainee pleaded guilty to the charge of being "an enemy of the people". Now Lavrenti, in a calm voice, overwhelms the man with the crudest words. Then he rings a bell and orders the guard to take the prisoner “downstairs”. It is the prisoner's last walk, because “downstairs” means “the cellar”.

所有这些罪犯都在未经审判的情况下被秘密处决。每个人都被宣读了第 58 条 A、B 和 C 款，然后被带到死刑牢房，一名士兵用腰带将双手绑在背后，并命令他额头靠在墙上。接下来，站在附近的米哈伊尔·穆德里 (Mikhaïl Moudri) 从枪套中取出纳甘左轮手枪，将枪管放在受害者的脖子上，然后扣动扳机。

All these convicts are executed without trial, in camera . Each is read Article 58, paragraphs A, B and C, then taken to the death cell where a soldier binds his hands behind his back with his belt and orders him to face the wall leaning his forehead. Next, Mikhaïl Moudri, who is standing nearby, takes his Nagan revolver out of its holster, puts the barrel on the victim's neck and pulls the trigger.

只有一个例外。在审讯亚美尼亚共产党第一书记阿加西·汗吉安时，贝利亚没有把他送进死刑室，而是在办公室里向他开枪自杀。这个人不会请求怜悯，但会像拉夫伦提乌斯对他那样侮辱他的审判者。他甚至会尝试向施虐者吐口水。贝利亚挥舞着他放在办公室的左轮手枪，当场开枪射杀了这名男子。这次暗杀将导致其他过于鲁莽的亚美尼亚共产党人的清算。

There will be only one exception. During the interrogation of Agasi Khanjian, first secretary of the Armenian Communist Party, Beria will shoot him himself in his office instead of sending him to the death room. The man will not ask for pity, but will shower his inquisitor with the same insults that Lavrentius hurled at him. He will even try to spit on his torturer. Beria brandishes the revolver he keeps in his office and shoots the man on the spot. This assassination will lead to the liquidation of other too reckless Armenian communists.

为了能够腾出手来在外高加索进行新的大清洗，贝利亚企图谋害他的生命。这必然成为镇压知识分子的借口。拉夫连季一直憎恨知识分子，他将知识分子等同于资产阶级。对他来说，这个词让人想起一个出生在有仆人的房子里，因此从来不需要从事体力劳动的人。贝利亚在第比利斯郊区的夏宫进行夜间巡逻时，密谋用手枪杀死了一名保镖，随后立即逮捕了三名男子。他从他们身上获取了想要的供词。这三位杰出人物是格鲁吉亚细菌学家格奥尔基·埃利瓦和两位亚美尼亚作家巴尔孔茨和扎贝尔·埃萨赞。前两个被执行在相机中在胁迫下承认该阴谋是由格鲁吉亚人民委员会前主席卡尔特维利奇维利组织的，他目前在莫斯科担任要职，也是贝利亚的激烈反对者。作家埃萨赞在承认自己意图杀害共产党外高加索委员会第一书记后，接受了亚美尼亚首都埃里温最高法院军事法庭等机构的审判，以向民众表明：在这个国家，没有什么比司法的客观性更受尊重的了。对扎贝尔·埃萨赞 (Zabel Esazan) 的判决是十年强迫劳动。然而，与其他两名被告一样，他的供词是在酷刑下获得的，为大规模逮捕和消灭数百名亚美尼亚人奠定了基础，其中有许多教授、建筑师、作家和其他知识分子，因为阴谋应该根源于知识分子。这次清洗不仅仅是贝利亚对知识分子的盲目仇恨的表现。拉夫连季非常清楚，在这个圈子里，民族主义和爱国情感是强烈的，这些人随时可以成为高加索爱国农民、渔民和山区人民的领袖。

In order to have a free hand for a new great purge in Transcaucasia, Beria mounts an attempt against his life. This must serve as a pretext for the crushing of intellectuals. Lavrenty has always hated the intelligentsia, which he identifies with the bourgeoisie. For him, this word evokes someone who was born in a house with servants and who therefore never had to engage in manual labor. Immediately after conspiring against himself by killing one of his bodyguards with a pistol, during a night patrol in his summer residence on the outskirts of Tbilisi, Beria had three men arrested. He extracts the desired confessions from them. These three eminent personalities are a Georgian bacteriologist, Georgi Eliva, and two Armenian writers Balkounts and Zabel Esazan. The first two are executedin cameraafter admitting under duress that the conspiracy was organized by Kartvelichvili, the former chairman of the Council of People's Commissars of Georgia, currently installed in an important post in Moscow and bitter opponent of Beria. The writer Esazan, after admitting that he had intended to kill the first secretary of the Transcaucasian Committee of the Communist Party, is tried for example by a military chamber of the Supreme Court of Yerevan, capital of Armenia in order to show the population that nothing is more respected in the country than the objectivity of justice. The verdict, for Zabel Esazan, is ten years of forced labor. However, his confessions, like those of the other two defendants, obtained under torture, set the stage for mass arrests and the liquidation of hundreds of Armenians, among them many professors, architects, writers and other intellectuals, because the conspiracy is supposed to have its roots in the intelligentsia. This purge is not just an expression of blind hatred on the part of Beria against intellectuals. Lavrenty knows perfectly well that in this circle nationalistic and patriotic feelings are strongly perpetuated and that these people can at any time become leaders for the patriotic peasants, fishermen and mountain people of the Caucasus.

这次清洗符合苏联事业的利益，提高了贝利亚在斯大林眼中的威望，也让拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇个人感到高兴。

The purge served the interests of the Soviet cause, enhanced Beria's prestige in Stalin's eyes and personally pleased Lavrenty Pavlovich.

当贝利亚在外高加索清除民族主义倾向的政委时，他毫不怀疑他的好朋友内斯托尔·拉科巴（在他的统治下，阿布哈兹被称为“民主绿洲”）是格鲁吉亚最狂热的爱国者之一。像他这样的政策构成了足够严重的犯罪，足以证明消灭领导人内斯特·拉科巴是合理的。根据总路线，拉科巴应该被处决。此外，内斯特知道贝利亚在巴库的活动并不像拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇所希望的那样令人印象深刻。拉科巴还知道贝利亚被关在库塔伊西监狱的真相，拉夫伦蒂在监狱里表现得像只绵羊，从未绝食。很明显，内斯特·拉科巴活不了多久了。

At the time when he was purifying Transcaucasia of commissars of nationalist orientation, Beria had no doubt that his excellent friend Nestor Lakoba, under whose administration Abkhazia was called an "oasis of democracy", was one of the most fervent Georgian patriots. A policy such as his constitutes a crime serious enough to justify the liquidation of the leader Nestor Lakoba. Depending on the general line, Lakoba should be executed. Besides, Nestor knows that Beria's activities in Baku are not as impressive as Lavrenty Pavlovich would like. Lakoba also knows the truth about Beria's stay in Kutaisi prison where Lavrenti behaved like a sheep and never went on a hunger strike. It is clear that Nestor Lakoba will not live much longer.

有一天，内斯特收到了一封来自他亲爱的校友“劳拉”的信，邀请他来格鲁吉亚首都一起度过一些学生之夜。拉科巴愉快地接受邀请并立即抵达第比利斯。贝利亚正在车站等他。他们像两兄弟一样公开接吻。然后，拉夫伦蒂带着内斯特乘坐他的专职司机驾驶的豪华轿车前往镇上最好的酒店，他在那里为他的前同伴预订了一间豪华套房。

One day, Nestor receives a letter from his dear school friend "Lara", asking him to come to the Georgian capital to spend some student evenings together. Lakoba accepts the invitation with pleasure and immediately arrives in Tbilisi. Beria is waiting for him at the station. They kiss publicly like two brothers. Then, Lavrenti takes Nestor, in his chauffeur-driven limousine, to the best hotel in town, where he has reserved a luxurious suite for his former companion.

两个朋友时隔多年再次重聚，令人倍感亲切。拉夫伦蒂邀请内斯特共进晚餐，并配以美酒。然后他们去了歌剧院，古典音乐爱好者贝利亚有他的更衣室。看完剧院后，他们在一家歌舞厅停下来吃晚饭，同时观看演出：伏特加、香槟、咖啡、利口酒。

The reunion of the two friends, after so much time, is more than cordial. Lavrenti invites Nestor to a dinner washed down with good wine. They then go to the opera where Beria, a classical music lover, has his dressing room. After the theater, they stop at a cabaret for supper while watching the show: vodka, champagne, coffee, liqueurs.

拉夫伦蒂带着内斯特回到酒店时已经很晚了。当他醉酒的朋友发现很难保持平衡时，贝利亚帮助他拿走了接待处的钥匙。他们哼着一首欢快的歌曲，爬上楼梯。

It is late when Lavrenti takes Nestor back to his hotel. As his drunk friend finds it difficult to keep his balance, Beria helps him to take the key to the reception. Humming a lively song, they climb the stairs.

拉夫伦蒂比他的同伴更清醒，帮助他找到了自己的套房并打开了门，他甚至脱掉了同伴的衣服并把他放到了床上。然后他关掉灯并离开。

More lucid than his companion, Lavrenti helps him to find his suite and to open the door, he even undresses his comrade and puts him to bed. Then he turns off the light and leaves.

第二天早上，阿布哈兹领导人、省会苏呼米第一位公民、人民委员内斯特·拉科巴被发现死在床上。接到酒店经理的警告后，贝利亚立即冲进去，并下令在套房的门上贴上封条。立即向阿布哈兹发出电报，宣布内斯特·拉科巴同志因心绞痛意外去世。在这种情况下，没有必要进行调查。尽管拉科巴是一位精力充沛、正值壮年的年轻人，但从未患过任何心脏病，但心绞痛的诊断必须接受。拉科巴的脖子是不是被短带上的小铁弹击中的，有点像指节铜套，贝利亚把它放在办公桌抽屉里，有时放在口袋里？我们永远不会知道。没有请法医，也没有进行尸检。此案已经结案。

The next morning, People's Commissar Nestor Lakoba, leader of Abkhazia and the first citizen of the provincial capital of Sukhumi, was found dead in his bed. Warned by the hotel manager, Beria immediately rushes over and orders the seals to be affixed to the door of the suite. A telegram is immediately sent to Abkhazia, announcing that comrade Nestor Lakoba has died unexpectedly from angina pectoris. In such circumstances, no investigation is necessary. The diagnosis of angina pectoris must be accepted, despite the fact that Lakoba, a vigorous young man in his prime, has never suffered from any heart trouble. Was Lakoba hit in the neck by the small iron bullet from a short strap, a sort of brass knuckles, that Beria keeps in his desk drawer and sometimes carries in his pocket? We'll never know. No medical examiner is called, no autopsy performed. The case is closed.

委员内斯特·阿波罗诺维奇·拉科巴的葬礼引起了官方的高度哀悼。由于一位杰出的人物，棺材被荣幸地运送到车站。在苏呼米，一大群人在等待火车，火车头悬挂着红旗和绉纱帆。长长的送葬队伍伴随着军乐，跟在六匹黑马拉着的灵车后面。在墓地，贝利亚陪伴着挚友的遗体，发表了感人的悼词。然后棺材被放入地下，坟墓上覆盖着花环和花束，花束上挂着带有金色字母的红色腰带。整个仪式的费用由苏维埃社会主义共和国国家承担。

The funeral of Commissioner Nestor Apollonovitch Lakoba gives rise to great official mourning. The coffin is transported to the station with all the honors due to an eminent personality. In Sukhumi, a huge crowd awaits the train whose locomotive carries red flags and crepe sails. A long funeral procession, accompanied by military music, follows the hearse pulled by six black horses. At the cemetery, Beria, who accompanied the remains of his dear friend, pronounces a moving eulogy. The coffin is then lowered into the ground and the tomb covered with garlands and bouquets bearing red sashes with gold letters. The whole ceremony takes place at the expense of the State of the Soviet Socialist Republic.

三天后，鲜花被移走，挖出的棺材消失，坟墓被夷为平地。拉科巴的遗孀本可以要求解释，但遭到逮捕并被驱逐到一个未知的目的地。还有其他人被捕。拉科巴的两个表兄弟米哈伊尔和鲍里斯也被拘留，不久后被处决。

Three days later, the flowers are removed, the exhumed coffin disappears, while the grave is leveled. Lakoba's widow, who could ask for explanations, is arrested and deported to an unknown destination. There are still other arrests. Two of Lakoba's cousins, Mikhaïl and Boris, were also interned and shortly afterwards executed.

在情报局专用的档案中，贝利亚插入了两名认识拉科巴的女性的证词。这些证人证明，格鲁吉亚民族主义者拉科巴曾计划暗杀伟大的斯大林同志。在贝利亚的档案中，毫无疑问拉科巴是叛徒和人民的敌人。

In the files for the exclusive use of the Sûreté, Beria inserts the depositions of two women who knew Lakoba. These witnesses certify that Lakoba, a Georgian nationalist, had planned to assassinate Grand Comrade Stalin. In Beria's file, it is asserted beyond doubt that Lakoba was a traitor and an enemy of the people.

贝利亚按照精心准备的计划消灭人民，其目标有两个：清除外高加索所有曾经或可能怀有反对苏联总路线的爱国感情的民族主义者，并消灭斯大林早期活动的所有目击者。这些处决是没有感情的，只是为了明确的目的。贝利亚所做的事情不多也不少于其自身政治生涯的发展所必需的。然而，在莫斯科，内务人民委员部领导人叶约夫正在像一个愤怒的怪物一样疯狂地消灭全国人民。基洛夫遇刺后，叶努基泽根据斯大林的命令签署了一项指令，数千人——男人、女人、儿童——被逮捕、处决或驱逐到集中营。

Beria annihilates the people according to a meticulously prepared plan with two objectives: to purge Transcaucasia of all nationalists who had, or could have harbored, patriotic feelings opposed to the general Soviet line, and to liquidate all witnesses of the early activities of Stalin. These executions are performed without emotion, only for a definite purpose. Beria does neither more nor less than is necessary for the advancement of his own political career. In Moscow, however, NKVD leader Yejov is liquidating people across the country with the gigantic frenzy of a furious monster. Following a directive signed by Yenukidze on the order of Stalin, after the assassination of Kirov, thousands of people – men, women, children – were arrested and executed or deported to concentration camps.

1937 年 6 月 11 日凌晨 2 点 30 分，在莫斯科的莱福尔托沃监狱，内务人民委员部的一个特别排处决了 1920 年苏波战争英雄、令人难忘的喀琅施塔得胜利者米哈伊尔·尼古拉耶维奇·图哈切夫斯基元帅。他是最高级别的军官，执行列宁、托洛茨基和捷尔任斯基的命令，屠杀了超过 15,000 名俄罗斯水兵。

On June 11, 1937, at 2:30 a.m., in the Lefortovo prison in Moscow, a special platoon of the NKVD executed Marshal Mikhail Nikolaevich Tukhachevsky, hero of the Soviet-Polish war of 1920 and memorable winner of Kronstadt. He was the highest-ranking officer who, carrying out the orders of Lenin, Trotsky and Dzerzhinsky, had massacred more than 15,000 Russian sailors.

与图哈切夫斯基同时被处决的还有另外七名红军将军。他们的妻子和孩子，像政治犯和叛徒的家人一样，被驱逐到西伯利亚的强迫劳动营。被处决的还有许多其他将军、指挥官和人民委员，以及乌克兰和白俄罗斯苏维埃社会主义共和国的总统。

At the same time as Tukhachevsky, seven other Red Army generals were executed. Their wives and children, like the families of political criminals and traitors, are deported to forced labor camps in Siberia. Also put to death are many other generals, commanders and people's commissars, as well as the presidents of the Soviet Socialist Republics of Ukraine and Belarus.

1937年12月20日，报刊上发布的一则简短公告宣布，阿维尔·叶努基泽、马米亚·奥拉赫拉什维利等几人因间谍和恐怖活动受到秘密军事法庭的审判，被判处死刑并被处决。“秘密军事法庭”是指没有进行定期审判，而是由三名秘密警察组成的法庭庭长（三名“三驾马车”）在监狱中向被拘留者宣读判决，并且执行过程是在秘密的情况下进行的。。

On December 20, 1937, a brief notice published in the press announced that Avel Yenukidze, Mamia Orakhelashvili and several other people had been tried by a secret military court for espionage and terrorist activities, sentenced to death and executed. "Secret military court" means that there was no regular trial, but that the sentence was read to the detainees, in their prison, by the president of a court of three secret police officers, a Troika, and that the execution took place in camera .

在将《真理报》中有关叶努基泽之死的剪报纳入档案后，贝利亚决定对他的《外高加索布尔什维克组织史》一书进行修改，该书原定于 1938 年出版第四版。在即将出版的书中，拉夫连季删除了他告诫叶努基泽和奥拉赫拉什维利所犯错误的句子，并用全新的段落代替：

After including in his files the clipping from Pravda relating to Yenukidze's death, Beria decided to make changes to his book on the History of Bolshevik Organizations in Transcaucasia , which was to see its fourth edition in 1938. In a copy which he intends to send to print soon, Lavrenti strikes out the sentences in which he admonishes Yenukidze and Orakhelashvili for the mistakes they have made and replaces them with entirely new paragraphs:

必须承认，外高加索和格鲁吉亚党组织的历史还远没有被彻底探索和充分对待。

It must be recognized that the history of the Party organizations in Transcaucasia and Georgia is still far from having been exhaustively explored and adequately treated.

至于外高加索布尔什维克的斗争，由菲利普·马哈拉泽（Philip Makharadze）的著作提供（《格鲁吉亚劳工运动史》、《1905年外高加索》、《第比利斯组织十三周年》、《外高加索革命运动概要》）等等），其中含有一些原则性错误和历史性错误，歪曲历史事实和历史事件，不诚实地介绍了党的历史的一些观点。

As for the accounts of the struggle of the Transcaucasian Bolsheviks, given by the works of Philip Makharadze ( History of the labor movement in Georgia, The year 1905 in Transcaucasia, The thirteenth anniversary of the Organization of Tiflis, Outline of the revolutionary movement in Transcaucasia , etc. .), they contain a number of errors of principle and errors of a historical nature, distortions of historical facts, and events, and they dishonestly present a number of points in the Party's history.

到目前为止，马哈拉泽同志还没有费心去审查他的著作并纠正其中的错误和歪曲。

So far, Comrade Makharadze has not bothered to review his works and correct the errors and distortions they contain.

叶努基泽和奥拉赫拉什维利被谴责为人民的敌人，他们在他们的书中故意歪曲和篡改该组织在外高加索的历史。

A. Yenukidze and M. Orakhelashvili, since denounced as enemies of the people, introduced into their books deliberate distortions and falsifications of the history of the organization in Transcaucasia.

并进一步 ：

And further :

后来被谴责为人民的死敌的叶努基泽在他的自传和小册子《我们在高加索的非法印刷店》中蓄意地、怀着敌意地伪造了外高加索布尔什维克组织的历史。他愤世嫉俗、公然歪曲众所周知的历史事实，为自己在建立巴库第一家非法印刷厂中所提供的所谓服务而沾沾自喜。

A. Yenukidze, later denounced as a deadly enemy of the people, deliberately and with hostile intentions falsified the history of the Bolshevik organizations in Transcaucasia in his autobiography and in his pamphlet Our Illegal Printing Shops in the Caucasus . He cynically and brazenly distorted well-known historical facts, gloating himself for supposed services he rendered in establishing Baku's first illegal printing house.

众所周知，面对对其谎言和歪曲的谴责迫在眉睫的威胁，叶努基泽被迫在 1935 年 1 月 16 日的《真理报》专栏中承认了自己的“错误”。

As we know, in the face of the imminent threat of the denunciation of his lies and distortions, A. Yenukidze was forced to admit his “errors” in the columns of Pravda of January 16, 1935.

贝利亚的这一声明揭示了阿维尔·叶努基泽唯一真正的罪行是敢于公布真相，即是他而不是才华横溢的斯大林在巴库组织了非法媒体。

This proclamation by Beria reveals that Avel Yenukidze's only real crime is to have dared to publish the truth that it was he, and not the brilliant Stalin, who had organized the illegal press in Baku.

这三个新段落是 1937 年 12 月添加的。它们听起来与 1935 年 7 月的演讲截然不同。

These three new paragraphs were added in December 1937. They sound radically different from that of the July 1935 speech.

回顾演讲的结尾，作者了解到自那时以来苏联发生了许多变化。斯大林新宪法出台，外高加索联邦被废除。口号“外高加索联邦万岁！” 拉夫伦蒂演讲后观众高呼并由他记录在手稿中的这段话必须删除。贝利亚大笔一挥，划掉了感叹号。但这还不够。拉夫连季决心不惜一切代价取悦他的老板，他不想默默地放弃斯大林的宪法，尽管距离第比利斯难忘的会议已经过去一年了。出于同样的原因，贝利亚也不想忽略废除外高加索联邦。

Reviewing the end of his presentation, the author understands that many changes have taken place since then in the USSR. Stalin's new constitution came into being and as a result, the Transcaucasian Federation was abolished. The slogan "Long live the Transcaucasian Federation!" chanted by the audience after Lavrenti's speech and recorded by him in his manuscript, must be deleted. With a stroke of the pen, Beria crosses out the exclamation. But this is not enough. Lavrenty, determined to please his boss by all means, did not want to ignore Stalin's constitution, although it was a year later than the memorable meeting in Tbilisi. For the same reasons, Beria does not want to omit the abolition of the Transcaucasian Federation.

经过短暂的思考后，拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇完全相信说服人们并迫使他们冷静的最好方法就是监禁他们，决定在他的文章中添加一些新段落。在涉及 1913 年至 1924 年期间的第四章中，贝利亚以冷漠的愤世嫉俗的态度描述了 1936 年的事件，就好像这些事件已经在他 1935 年的演讲中报道过一样。

After a brief reflection, Lavrenti Pavlovich, fully convinced that the best way to convince people and to compel them to calm is to imprison them, decides to add a few new paragraphs to his essay. In the fourth chapter, which deals with the period 1913-1924, Beria, with cold cynicism, describes the events of 1936 as if they had already been reported in his 1935 speech.

这是这段话：

Here is the passage:

……1936年，随着苏联斯大林主义宪法的通过，外高加索联邦解散，外高加索各共和国——格鲁吉亚、阿塞拜疆和亚美尼亚——直接加入苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟，成为拥有主权的联盟共和国。

… In 1936, with the adoption of the Stalinist constitution of the USSR, the Transcaucasian Confederation was dissolved and the republics of Transcaucasia – Georgia, Azerbaijan and Armenia – joined the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics directly as republics of the Union with sovereign rights.

外高加索联邦的废除是我们党的总路线特别是民族政策的成就和胜利的直接结果，是我们党在革命岁月中建设社会主义过程中所取得的成就和胜利的直接结果。外高加索共和国。

The abolition of the Transcaucasian Federation is a direct consequence of the achievements and victories of the general line and, in particular, of the national policy of our Party, of the achievements and victories acquired during the revolutionary years in the process of construction of socialism in the republics of Transcaucasia.

外高加索联邦完成了赋予它的所有任务，履行了其历史作用。外高加索共和国成为工业化和农业共和国。集体农庄制度在外高加索地区的农业中盛行。民族文化建设取得巨大进步。外高加索共和国组建了完全忠于列宁和斯大林党的布尔什维克国家干部。

The Transcaucasian Federation has fulfilled its historic role by fulfilling all the tasks assigned to it. The republics of Transcaucasia became industrialized and agricultural republics. The system of collective farms prevails in the agriculture of Transcaucasia. Enormous progress has been made in the development of the national culture. The republics of Transcaucasia formed national Bolshevik cadres entirely devoted to the Party of Lenin and Stalin.

格鲁吉亚、阿塞拜疆和亚美尼亚扩大了与苏联其他共和国、领土和地区的经济和文化联系，建设社会主义所取得的胜利为废除外高加索联邦和外高加索各共和国直接加入苏联创造了条件。苏联。

Having expanded the economic and cultural ties of Georgia, Azerbaijan and Armenia with other republics, territories and regions of the Soviet Union, the victories achieved in building socialism prepared the conditions for the abolition of the Transcaucasian Federation and the direct accession of the Transcaucasian republics to the Soviet Union.

苏联新宪法确保了外高加索各国和整个苏联之间的友谊得到进一步加强。它保证了列宁、斯大林的民族政策取得新的伟大成就。

The new constitution of the USSR ensures the further strengthening of friendship between the nations of Transcaucasia and the entire Soviet Union. It ensures great and new achievements on the part of the national policy of Lenin and Stalin .

然后，拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇断言：

Then, Lavrenti Pavlovich affirms:

热烈而持久的掌声。每个人都站起来。大厅里回荡着“伟大的斯大林万岁！”的呼喊声。“斯大林同志万岁！” “布尔什维克党中央万岁！” »

Loud and prolonged applause. Everybody get up. The hall resounds with cries of "Long live the great Stalin!" "Hurrah for Comrade Stalin!" "Long live the Central Committee of the Bolshevik Party!" »

只字不提“外高加索联邦万岁！”的口号。因为外高加索联邦现在已经不复存在了。但这份更正后的报告告诉读者，在斯大林伟大的宪法制定一年半之前，全体观众都站起来为它鼓掌。
