Before condemning his close friends to death, he ordered that in each factory, in each collective farm, guard dogs, officially called politrouks- political guides and propaganda officers specially attached to farms or factories - organize mass meetings, in which speeches were made to show the villainy of the accused. At the end of his speech, the speaker asked the audience to make a statement condemning the victims. This declaration was signed by all those present and expressed the wish of the nation. The workers and peasants who were herded to these meetings had to do whatever the speaker asked, even if sometimes they sympathized with the victim or had never heard of it. Any attempt at opposition was obviously out of the question. In this way the defendants were condemned publicly, not only by Stalin,

贝利亚也采用同样的方法。在数百个城市和乡村，组织了谴责拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇的集会。但这一次的被告对人们来说并不陌生。几乎每个家庭都至少有一个人是贝利亚的受害者，要么被监禁，要么被送进劳改营，要么被处决。观众现在真的很高兴听到官方发言人宣布迫害他们亲人的人是一个卑鄙的人，一个叛徒和一个恶棍，他最终会受到他的行为的惩罚。他们高呼赞同，争先恐后地在决议上签字，希望这位总督最终能得到他应有的命运。

In the case of Beria, the same method is applied. In hundreds of cities and countryside, meetings are organized to condemn Lavrenti Pavlovich. But this time the accused is no stranger to the people. In almost every family, at least one person has been a victim of Beria, either imprisoned, sent to a labor camp or executed. The audience is really happy now to hear the official speaker declare that the persecutor of their loved ones is such a base individual, a traitor and a scoundrel who will finally suffer the punishment his activities. They shout their approval and rush to sign the resolution in hopes that this satrap will finally get the fate he has long deserved.

他们的请求被发送给莫斯科两家主要报纸《真理报》和《消息报》，并发表了强烈评论。1953年12月20日，《真理报》头版刊登了一篇题为《人民的愤怒》的文章，宣布贝利亚有罪，当时他仍在等待审判。《消息报》在12月23日题为《苏联人民的愤怒之声》的社论中更加咄咄逼人，其中引用了几位公民的声明，并附有序言和评论。

Their requests are sent to the two main Moscow newspapers, Pravda and Izvestia , which publish them with strong comments. On December 20, 1953, on the front page of Pravda , an article titled THE ANGER OF THE PEOPLE declared Beria guilty, while he was still awaiting trial. The Izvestia are even more aggressive in their editorial of December 23, entitled THE ANGEROUS VOICE OF THE SOVIET PEOPLE, which quotes the declarations of several citizens accompanied by a preface and comments.

同日，《真理报》还刊登了该报全国各地记者发给编辑部的此类信息。这些谩骂的标题是“苏联所有国家一致要求对祖国的叛徒贝利亚间谍及其团伙进行严厉的惩罚”。

On the same day, Pravda also publishes such messages sent to the editorial office by the newspaper's correspondents around the country. These diatribes are titled “ALL NATIONS OF THE USSR ARE UNANIMOUS IN DEMANDING SEVERE PUNISHMENT FOR THE TRAITORS TO THEIR COUNTRY, THE BERIA SPIES AND HIS GANG”.

所有这些愤怒的呼声无疑都是真诚的，不是因为贝利亚被指控为英国特工、间谍和叛徒，这些罪行几乎没有人相信，而是因为他迫害了数百万无辜的苏联人。

All these cries of anger are unquestionably sincere, not because Beria is accused of being a British agent, a spy and a traitor, crimes in which almost no one believes, but because he persecuted millions of innocent Soviets.

《真理报》在第二天发表的一篇耸人听闻的标题文章中总结了全国范围内爆发的民众愤怒：

The explosion of popular anger erupting across the country is summed up by Pravda in an article published the following day under the sensational headline:

对叛徒和间谍毫不留情！这是全苏联人民的一致愿望

NO MERCY FOR TRAITORS AND SPIES! THIS IS THE UNANIMOUS WISH OF THE WHOLE SOVIET PEOPLE

昨天，定居点、集体农场、国营农场、建筑企业、机关单位都召开了会议。苏联国家愤怒地指责贝利亚及其同伙，要求将这些死敌从地球上消灭。

Yesterday, meetings were held in settlements, collective and state farms, in construction enterprises and in institutions. The Soviet nation angrily blames Beria and his accomplices, demanding that these sworn enemies be wiped off the face of the earth.

苏联群众的所有这些愤怒表达决定了贝利亚政委已经决定的命运，他在无所不能后被废黜。与此同时，在莫斯科，对贝利亚和他的六名被指控的同伙——梅尔库洛夫、杰卡诺佐夫、科布洛夫、戈格利泽、梅奇尼克和弗洛济米尔斯基——的审判预计将进行。

All these expressions of anger from the Soviet masses sealed the fate already decided upon of Commissar Beria, deposed after having been omnipotent. Meanwhile, in Moscow, the trial of Beria and six of his alleged accomplices, Merkulov, Dekanozov, Kobulov, Goglidze, Mechnik and Vlodzimirsky, is supposed to take place.

根据阿列克谢·亚库舍夫向西德《明镜周刊》杂志提供并于1969年12月8日在汉堡发表的消息，审判开始较早。雅库切夫曾在莫斯科、后来在华沙担任自然科学哲学教授，后来避难于西方。他声称，他参加的对贝利亚及其部分下属的审判是在莫斯科工会大楼内进行的，并于 1953 年 12 月 14 日开始。

According to information given by Alexei Yakushev to the West German magazine Der Spiegel and published in Hamburg on December 8, 1969, the trial started earlier. Yakuchev, professor of philosophy of natural sciences in Moscow and later in Warsaw, took refuge in the West. He claims that the trial of Beria and some of his subordinates, which he attended, took place in the trade union building in Moscow and began on December 14, 1953.

雅库切夫在接受《明镜周刊》采访时表示，他在审判第一天就获得了进入法庭的通行证，并在被告席上看到了贝利亚和其他被告。然而，很难相信这个证词。雅库切夫说，法庭上有 120 多人，并补充说，其中没有西方记者，甚至没有当地记者。此外，雅库切夫给出的开审日期为12月14日，而12月24日《真理报》则正式宣布开审日期为12月18日。

In an interview with Der Spiegel , Yakuchev states that he got a pass to enter the courtroom on the first day of the trial and saw Beria and the other defendants in the dock. However, it is difficult to believe this testimony. Yakuchev says there were more than 120 people in the courtroom and adds that there were no Western or even local journalists among them. Furthermore, Yakuchev gives December 14 as the date for the opening of the trial, while the December 24 Pravda officially announces that the trial opened on December 18.

亚库切夫将这个穿着灰色西装打领带的安静男人描述为贝利亚，他可能只是拉夫连季·巴甫洛维奇的替身，已经被清算了。他本可以在法庭上在真正的共同被告中扮演被解雇的专员的角色。但既然审判不是为了表演，媒体和摄影师都没有在场，法庭为什么要上演这样的喜剧呢？采访中并没有解释这一点。然而，亚库舍夫声称，除了所有政治指控外，贝利亚还因其不道德行为而受到起诉：他与十岁左右的小女孩组织狂欢，并将她们奴役在格鲁吉亚的别墅中，以及他对待年轻女孩的虐待狂和变态行为，他常常从街上绑架并在他的办公室或莫斯科卡恰洛夫街 28 号的家里强奸。官方起诉书中具体说明的这些指控是众所周知的。在审判期间，它们被用来对付前秘密警察头子，无论是在工会大厅进行，还是在没有证人的情况下进行，相机内。

It is possible that the quiet man, in a gray suit and tie, whom Yakuchev describes as Beria was only a double of Lavrenty Pavlovich, already liquidated. He would have played before the Court the role of the dismissed commissioner in the midst of his real co-defendants. But why would the Court have staged this comedy since the trial was not for show, neither the press nor the photographers were present? The interview does not explain it. Yakushev, however, claims that, in addition to all the political charges, Beria was prosecuted for his immoral conduct: the orgies he organized with the little girls of about ten years old, whom he enslaved in his villa in Georgia, and the sadistic perversions with which he treated the young girls he used to kidnap from the streets and rape in his office or in his house at 28 Katchalov Street in Moscow. These charges, specified in the official indictment, are public knowledge. They were used against the former head of the secret police during his trial, whether it took place in the hall of the unions or, without witnesses,in-camera.

1953 年 12 月 24 日，《真理报》宣布了对贝利亚及其同案被告的正式起诉和判刑，以及处决，具体内容如下：

On December 24, 1953, Pravda announced the official indictment and sentence, as well as the execution of Beria and his co-accused, in the following terms:

致苏联最高法院

TO THE SUPREME COURT OF THE USSR

1953年12月18日至23日，苏联最高法院特别司法会议由苏联元帅、最高法院特别司法会议主席科涅夫和特别会议成员N. M. Shvernik组成，全联盟工会委员会主席E.L.扎伊丁，苏联最高法院第一副主席K.S.莫斯卡连科，陆军上将N.A.米哈伊洛夫，苏联共产党莫斯科地区委员会书记N.A.米哈伊洛夫，格鲁吉亚工会理事会主席 M. I. 库恰瓦、莫斯科市法院院长 L. A. 格罗莫夫、苏联内务部第一副部长 K. F. 劳涅夫闭门秘密会议，根据1934 年12 月 1 日法律规定的程序正式成立 ，审议了 LP Beria 等人的刑事案件。

From December 18 to 23, 1953, the Special Judicial Session of the Supreme Court of the USSR consisting of IS Konev, Marshal of the Soviet Union, Chairman of the Special Judicial Session of the Supreme Court, and members of the Special Session, N. M. Shvernik, Chairman of the All-Union Council of Trade Unions, E. L. Zaidin, First Deputy Chairman of the Supreme Court of the USSR, K. S. Moskalenko, Army General, N. A. Mikhailov, Secretary of the Moscow Region Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, M. I. Kuchava, Chairman of the Council of Trade Unions of Georgia, L. A. Gromov, Chairman of the Moscow City Court, K. F. Lounev, First Deputy Minister of Internal Affairs of the USSR sitting in secret session in camera, duly constituted under the procedure established by the law of December 1, 1934  , considered the criminal case of LP Beria and others.

根据起诉书，L.P.贝利亚是根据俄罗斯苏维埃社会主义共和国联邦刑法第58-1 B、58-8、58-13、58-11条预防犯罪而接受审判的。V. N. Merkulov、V. G. Dekanozov、B. Z. Kobulov、S. A. Goglidze、P. I. Mechnik 和 LE Vlodzimirsky 因俄罗斯苏维埃社会主义共和国联邦刑法第 58-1 B、58-8、58-11 条规定的罪行受到审判。

Under the indictment, L. P. Beria was brought to trial under the prevention of crimes under Articles 58-1 B, 58-8, 58-13, 58-11 of the Criminal Code of the Soviet Socialist Republic Federation of Russia. V. N. Merkulov, V. G. Dekanozov, B. Z. Kobulov, S. A. Goglidze, P. I. Mechnik and LE Vlodzimirsky, are tried on charges of crimes under Articles 58-1 B, 58-8, 58-11 of the Criminal Code of the Soviet Socialist Republic Federation of Russia.

司法调查充分证实了起诉书中向被告人透露的初步调查的揭露内容。

The judicial investigation fully confirmed the revelations of the preliminary investigation, exposed to the defendants in the indictment.

法院认定，贝利亚背叛国家并为外国资本利益行事，组织了一个敌视苏联国家的阴谋叛徒集团，其成员包括被告 VN Merkulov、V. G. Dekanozov、B. Z. Kobulov、S. A. Goglidze、P. I. Mechnik 和 LE弗洛吉米尔斯基（Vlodzimirski）与贝利亚有关联，参与了长达数年的共同犯罪活动。

The Court established that, betraying the country and acting in the interests of foreign capital, Beria organized a group of conspiratorial traitors, hostile to the Soviet state and consisting of defendants VN Merkulov, V. G. Dekanozov, B. Z. Kobulov, S. A. Goglidze, P. I. Mechnik and LE Vlodzimirski, associated with Beria in joint criminal activities spanning several years.

阴谋者的犯罪意图是利用内务部机关来反对共产党和苏联政府，将内务部凌驾于党和政府之上，以达到夺取政权的目的。摧毁工农苏维埃制度，复辟资本主义，复辟资产阶级政权。

The criminal intent of the conspirators was to use the organs of the Ministry of Internal Affairs against the Communist Party and against the government of the USSR, to elevate the Ministry of Internal Affairs above the Party and the government with the aim of to seize power, to destroy the Soviet system of workers and peasants, to restore capitalism and to restore the power of the bourgeoisie.

法院认为，邪恶和犯罪活动以及与外交部门建立秘密通信的开始可以追溯到 1919 年内战期间，当时居住在巴库的 LP Beria 犯下了叛国罪。作为阿塞拜疆反革命穆萨瓦蒂政府情报部门的秘密特工，在英国情报网络的控制下运作。

The Court found that the beginnings of the nefarious and criminal activities as well as the establishment of secret communications with foreign services date back to 1919, during the time of the civil war, when LP Beria, residing in Baku, committed an act of treason by working as a secret agent for the Intelligence of the counter-revolutionary Musavatist government of Azerbaijan, operating under the control of the British Intelligence network.

1920 年，L.P. 贝利亚住在格鲁吉亚，他与格鲁吉亚孟什维克政府的秘密警察（后者也是英国情报部门的一个组织）建立秘密联系，犯下了新的叛国罪。

In 1920, L. P. Beria was living in Georgia where he committed a new act of treason by establishing clandestine communications with the secret police of the Menshevik government of Georgia, the latter also being a cell of British Intelligence.

在接下来的几年里，L.P. 贝利亚继续并扩大了与外国情报机构的秘密交易，直到他被捕。

Over the next few years, L.P. Beria continued and expanded his secret dealings with foreign intelligence, up to the time of his arrest.

多年来，L.P. 贝利亚及其同伙小心翼翼地掩盖和伪装他们的敌对活动。

Over the years, L.P. Beria and his accomplices have carefully concealed and camouflaged their hostile activities.

斯大林去世后，贝利亚乘帝国主义反动势力对苏联政府的攻击加剧，加大了反苏叛国图谋的实施力度，使他的反苏叛国图谋在短时间内败露。贝利亚和他的同伙及时制止了他们的犯罪活动。

After the death of JV Stalin, counting on the intensification of the attacks launched against the Soviet government by the reactionary imperialist forces, L. P. Beria increased his efforts to carry out his anti-Soviet treasonous designs, which made it possible to unmask in a short time Beria time as well as his accomplices and to put an end to their criminal activities.

1953年3月，被告人LP·贝利亚就任苏联内务部长时，准备夺取政权，并开始提拔其阴谋集团的许多成员担任中央机关和苏联机关的领导职务。内政部。L. P. 贝利亚及其同伙迫害内务部的诚实雇员，这些雇员拒绝执行共谋者的犯罪命令。

When he became Minister of Internal Affairs of the USSR in March 1953, the defendant LP Beria, preparing to seize power, set out to raise many of the members of his group of conspirators to leading positions in the central organs as well as premises of the Ministry of Internal Affairs. L. P. Beria and his accomplices persecuted honest employees of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, who refused to carry out the criminal orders of the conspirators.

为了实现他们邪恶的反苏主义目标，L.P.贝利亚及其同伙采取了一系列犯罪行动，目的是使苏维埃各加盟共和国资产阶级和民族主义分子的残余势力复活，在苏联各国之间发展敌对和不信任。 ，首先是破坏苏联各民族对伟大俄罗斯民族的友谊。

To achieve their goals of villainous anti-Sovietism, L. P. Beria and his accomplices undertook a number of criminal actions with a view to regenerating the remnants of the bourgeois and nationalist elements of the Soviet republics, to developing hostility and mistrust between the nations of the USSR, to undermine, above all, the friendship of the nations of the USSR for the great Russian nation.

被告人LP·贝利亚作为苏联的坚决反对者，意图给国家粮食供应制造困难，破坏和阻挠党为加强集体农庄和国营农场经济、稳定发展而采取的重要措施的实施。提高苏联人民的繁荣。

Acting as an abject opponent of the Soviet nation and intending to create difficulties in the country's food supply, the defendant LP Beria sabotaged and obstructed the application of important measures taken by the Party to strengthen the economy of the collective farms and state farms and to steadily raise the prosperity of the Soviet people.

现已确定，被告 LP Beria 及其同伙通过隐瞒和掩饰其犯罪活动，对他们担心遭到举报的人实施了恐怖主义行为。诽谤、阴谋和各种形式的挑衅是阴谋者针对党和苏维埃政府的诚实工人所使用的主要手段，他们阻碍了LP贝利亚及其领导的苏维埃国家敌对计划的实现。共犯，以及阻碍他们争夺权力的人。

It has been established that, by concealing and camouflaging their criminal activities, defendants LP Beria and his accomplices perpetrated acts of terrorism on persons whose denunciation they feared. Slander, intrigues and various forms of provocation were among the main methods used by the conspirators against the honest workers of the Party and the Soviet government, who stood in the way of the realization of the designs hostile to the Soviet state of LP Beria and his accomplices, and who thwarted their race for power.

法院认定，被告 LP Beria、V.N. Merkulov、V.G. Dekanozov、B.Z. Kobulov、S.A. Goglidze、国家安全部、国家安全部和内务部 MVD 的 P.I. 犯下了一系列严重罪行，意图镇压忠于共产党和苏维埃政府的正直干部。

The Court established that the defendants LP Beria, V.N. Merkulov, V.G. Dekanozov, B.Z. Kobulov, S.A. Goglidze, P.I. of State Security, the MGB, and of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, the MVD, committed a number of serious crimes with the intention of suppressing honest cadres who were devoted to the Communist Party and the Soviet government.

法院还认定，LP Beria 所犯的罪行证明了他的道德堕落，并且犯下了贪婪、自高和滥用权力的犯罪行为。

The Court also established that LP Beria committed crimes that attest to his moral degeneration and that he committed acts of criminal greed, self-exaltation and abuse of power.

法院根据真实的文件、物证、被告人书写的文件以及大量证人证词，认定所有被告人有罪。

The guilt of all the defendants is established by the Court on the basis of authentic documents, material evidence, documents written by them and numerous witness statements.

被告 LP Beria、V. N. Merkoulov、V. G. Dekanozov、B. Z. Koboulov、S. A. Goglidzé、P. I. Mechnik 和 LE Vlodzimirski 对法院提供的证据感到困惑，他们证实了他们在预审期间遇到的情况，并承认了自己的罪行：实施了许多叛国行为。

Confounded by the evidence produced by the Court, the defendants LP Beria, V. N. Merkoulov, V. G. Dekanozov, B. Z. Koboulov, S. A. Goglidzé, P. I. Mechnik and LE Vlodzimirski confirmed the elements with which they were confronted during the preliminary hearings and they confessed their guilt as to the accomplishment of numerous acts of high treason.

苏联最高法院特别司法会议判定LP贝利亚犯有叛国罪，他组织了一批反苏阴谋分子，旨在夺取政权并恢复资产阶级权威，对人民进行恐怖活动。致力于共产党和苏联各国的政治领导人，积极反对 1919 年巴库的革命工人运动，当时贝利亚是为阿塞拜疆反革命穆萨瓦政府情报部门工作的秘密特工，他与外国情报部门接触，直至他的活动被揭露并被捕，即犯下第 58-1 B、58-8、58-13 条所涵盖的罪行，俄罗斯联邦苏维埃社会主义共和国刑法第 58-11 条。

A special judicial session of the Supreme Court of the USSR found LP Beria guilty of treason against the country by organizing a group of anti-Soviet conspirators with the aim of seizing power and restoring the authority of the bourgeoisie, by carrying out acts of terrorism against political leaders devoted to the Communist Party and to the nations of the Soviet Union, by active opposition to the revolutionary workers' movement in Baku in 1919, when Beria was a secret agent working for the Intelligence of the counter-revolutionary Musavatist government of Azerbaijan, where he came into contact with a foreign intelligence service until the moment of exposure of his activities and his arrest, that is to say by the commission of the crimes covered by Articles 58-1 B, 58-8, 58-13,58-11 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federated Soviet Socialist Republic.

法院认定被告 VN Merkulov、V. G. Dekanozov、B. Z. Kobulov、S. A. Goglidze、P. I. Mechnik 和 LE Vlodzimirski 犯有叛国罪、恐怖主义行为和参加邪恶的反苏组织罪，是指俄罗斯联邦苏维埃社会主义共和国刑法第58-1 B、58-8、58-11条所涵盖的犯罪。

The Court found the guilt of the defendants VN Merkulov, V. G. Dekanozov, B. Z. Kobulov, S. A. Goglidze, P. I. Mechnik and LE Vlodzimirski, guilty of treason against the country, guilty of acts of terrorism and of participation in a villainous anti-Soviet group, that is, offenses covered by Articles 58-1 B, 58-8, 58-11 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federated Soviet Socialist Republic.

苏联最高法院特别司法会议决定判处LP贝利亚、V.N.梅尔库洛夫、B.Z.科布洛夫、S.A.戈格利泽、P.I.梅奇尼克、L.E.弗洛济米尔斯基死刑：枪决、没收个人财产、没收军衔和军衔。区别。

The special judicial session of the Supreme Court of the USSR decides to sentence LP Beria, V. N. Merkulov, B. Z. Kobulov, S. A. Goglidze, P. I. Mechnik, L. E. Vlodzimirsky to capital punishment: death by shooting, confiscation of their personal property, forfeiture of military ranks and distinctions.

该判决是终审判决，不得上诉。

The sentence is final and without appeal.

裁决的执行

ENFORCEMENT OF AWARD

昨天，即12月23日，苏联最高法院特别会议作出的对LP贝利亚、V.N.梅尔库洛夫、V.G.德卡诺佐夫、B.Z.科布洛夫、S.A.戈格利泽、P.I.梅奇尼克和LE弗洛济米尔斯基枪杀的判决已经执行。

Yesterday, December 23, the sentence handed down by the special session of the Supreme Court of the USSR, sentencing LP Beria, V. N. Merkulov, V. G. Dekanozov, B. Z. Kobulov, S. A. Goglidze, P. I. Mechnik and LE Vlodzimirski to death by shooting has been executed.

这是贝利亚结局的官方版本。

This is the official version of the end of Beria.

第二天，即 1953 年 12 月 25 日，《真理报》发表了一篇头版社论，标题为：

The next day, December 25, 1953, Pravda published a front-page editorial titled:

法庭判决 – 国家判决

COURT SENTENCE – NATION VERDICT

他宣称苏联公民完全支持法院的裁决，并公开宣布拉夫连季·巴甫洛维奇·贝利亚的死亡消息。

He declares that Soviet citizens fully subscribe to the Court's decision and publicly announces the death of Lavrenty Pavlovich Beria.

与此同时，新任专员谢尔盖·尼基福罗维奇·克鲁格洛夫（Sergei Nikiforovitch Krouglov），即杜鲁门总统和温斯顿·丘吉尔爵士在波茨坦会议上深爱的无害小动物，接替贝利亚担任安全警察局长，并下令逮捕贝利亚的妻子尼娜和他们的儿子以及他们立即从监狱转移到开往西伯利亚强迫劳动营的货运火车的牛车上。他们在莫斯科卡恰洛夫街 28 号的房子和郊区的别墅都被查封了。两栋大楼里的一切，古董家具、东方地毯、银器、中国瓷器、绘画、配有投影仪和电影设备的图书馆，装有各种酒类和装满色情照片的相册的衣柜也被没收并装上卡车，运往存放被捕罪犯财物的仓库。贝利亚在格鲁吉亚拥有的三栋房屋也受到同样的待遇，其中两栋在第比利斯，一栋在索契度假胜地。

At the same time, the new Commissioner Sergei Nikiforovitch Krouglov, that harmless little animal that President Truman and Sir Winston Churchill loved so much at the Potsdam conference, succeeded Beria as head of the Sûreté police and ordered the arrest of Nina, Beria's wife, and their son and their immediate transfer from prison to the cattle car of a freight train bound for a forced labor camp in Siberia. Their house in Moscow, 28 rue Katchalov, and their villa in the suburbs are sealed. Everything contained in the two buildings, antique furniture, oriental rugs, silverware, Chinese porcelain, paintings, a library equipped with projectors and cinema equipment, as well as the closet which contains various kinds of liquors and albums filled with pornographic photographs is confiscated and loaded into trucks which take it to the warehouse where the belongings of the arrested criminals are kept. The same treatment is applied to the three houses that Beria owned in Georgia, two in Tbilisi and one in the holiday resort of Sochi.

克罗格洛夫委员还向苏联所有公共图书馆发出了一份备忘录，要求将贝利亚的著作《外高加索布尔什维克组织史》连同贝利亚的所有著作和照片下架并销毁。将对《苏联大百科全书》第五卷的字母B进行修改。载有拉夫伦蒂传记的页面。带有肖像的贝利亚必须被移除并销毁。它们将被白令海峡的照片、有关该海峡的详细信息以及一位18 世纪默默无闻的政治家的传记所取代。 世纪，伯霍尔茨。新页面附在备忘录后。

Commissar Krouglov also sent a memorandum to all public libraries in the Soviet Union, asking that LP Beria's work, History of Bolshevik Organizations in Transcaucasia , be removed from the shelves and destroyed, along with all of Beria's writings and photographs. A change is to be made to the fifth volume of the Great Soviet Encyclopedia , under the letter B. The pages that carry the biography of Lavrenti p. Beria, illustrated with a portrait must be removed and destroyed. They will be replaced by a photograph of the Bering Strait, detailed information on this strait and the biography of an obscure 18th century statesman . century, Berholtz. The new pages are attached to the memorandum.

同时，所有城镇、村庄和其他地方的市长都被要求重新命名纪念贝利亚的地方。他的祖国乔治亚州尤其担心。那里的许多大道和花园都以他的名字命名。根据这一命令，格鲁吉亚首都第比利斯市中心最宜人的地方——贝里亚广场——更名为列宁广场，城市主干道贝里亚街更名为加里宁街。

Simultaneously, all mayors of towns, villages and other localities are asked to rename places dedicated to Beria. His native Georgia is particularly concerned. Many avenues and gardens bear his name there. Pursuant to this order, the most pleasant place in the heart of Tbilisi, the capital of Georgia – Beria Square – is renamed Lenin Square and the main city avenue, Beria Street, becomes Kalinin Street.

如果贝利亚没有像某些版本的死亡说法那样，在六个月前在克里姆林宫举行的政治局会议上被杀，而是根据法官闭门或在 12 月举行的公开审判中作出的判决，以通常的方式处决，程序相同。

If Beria was not killed during the Politburo meeting held in the Kremlin six months earlier, as some accounts of his death claim, but executed in the usual manner pursuant to a sentence passed by judges either behind closed doors or in a public trial held in December, the procedure is the same.

与任何重要的罪犯一样，贝利亚必须移交内政部第一特别部门负责，而安全中将布洛欣则必须采取通常的行动。拉夫连季从法庭被一辆装甲警车转移到捷尔任斯基街11号的卢比扬卡监狱，他对这座建筑的每一个细节都了如指掌。在那里，他被护送到死囚牢房所在的地下室。在其中一个地窖里，贝利亚被命令脱掉衣服，穿上一件送给他的长白衬衫。

Like any important convict, Beria had to pass under the responsibility of the first Special Department of the MVD, and Lieutenant General of Security Blokhin had to take the usual action. From the courtroom, Lavrenty was transferred in an armored police car to 11 Dzerzhinsky Street, the Lubyanka prison, the building he knew in every detail. There he was escorted to the basement which houses the cells for death row inmates. In one of these cellars, Beria was ordered to take off his clothes and put on a long white shirt that was given to him.

然后他被带到了死亡牢房。他必须站在那里，面朝墙壁，额头抵在墙上。不久，刽子手，一位负责清算马克死刑犯的“T同志”，从他的后颈开枪。“T同志”使用的是八发自动手枪。如果在第一次打击后受害者还活着，“T同志”就会重复他的手势，直到第八个也是最后一个球。

Then he was taken to the death cell. He had to stand there, facing the wall, his forehead resting on it. Soon, the executioner, a certain "Comrade T" in charge of the liquidation of the condemned of mark, shot him in the back of the neck. “Comrade T” uses an eight-shot automatic pistol. If, after the first blow, the victim is still alive, “comrade T” repeats his gesture until the eighth and last ball.

然后监狱医生确认死亡并签署死亡证明。然后一名清洁女工带着一桶热水、肥皂和拖把来清理所有痕迹。最后来了两个拿着防水布的警卫。他们躺在地上，将尸体滚在里面，然后把它带到后院，一辆卡车正在等待。他们将尸体赶出城镇，埋在乱葬坑中，这是一个名副其实的坑，然后将其夷为平地，以清除尸体隐藏位置的任何痕迹。

Then comes the prison doctor who confirms the death and signs the death certificate. A cleaning lady then arrives with a bucket of hot water, soap and a mop to clean up any traces. Finally come two guards carrying a tarp. They lay down on the ground and roll the body in it, then take it to the backyard where a truck is waiting. They drive the body out of town and bury it in a mass grave, a veritable pit, which is then leveled to remove any hint of where the body is concealed.

苏联国家安全内务部长、苏联元帅罪犯的死亡证明现已从地球表面消失，加入了受害者档案。

The death certificate of the convict, Minister of Internal Affairs of State Security of the USSR, Soviet Marshal, now removed from the face of the earth, went to join the file of victims.

这是最终的文件。委员拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇·贝利亚 (Lavrenti Pavlovich Beria) 的案件已结案。

It is the ultimate document. The case of commissioner Lavrenti Pavlovich Beria is closed.

从十月革命至今苏联特勤局的组织概览

OVERVIEW OF THE ORGANIZATION OF THE SOVIET SECRET SERVICES, FROM THE OCTOBER REVOLUTION TO THE PRESENT

当布尔什维克于 1917 年底掌权时，他们继承了帝国总理府第三部门（1826-1880 年）的技术，该部门于 1881 年成为 Okhrana，这个沙皇秘密警察从 1857 年到 1863 年从经验中受益著名的普鲁士间谍威廉·施蒂伯。

When the Bolsheviks took power at the end of 1917, they inherited the techniques of the Third Section of the Imperial Chancellery (1826-1880) which became Okhrana in 1881, this tsarist secret police which had benefited, from 1857 to 1863, from the experience of the famous Prussian spy Wilhelm Stieber.

Tcheka，即打击反革命特别委员会，由共产主义国家于 1917 年 12 月 7 日（20 日）成立，是苏联特工部门的直接祖先。

The Tcheka, or Extraordinary Commission to Combat the Counter-Revolution, established on December 7 (20), 1917 by the communist state, was to be the direct ancestor of the USSR's secret services.

1922 年 2 月 6 日的一项法令废除了 Tcheka，代之以国家政治指导组织：GPU（GPU）或 Guépéou，该组织于 1923 年 11 月 15 日更名为国家协调政治指导组织（OGPU）。

A decree of February 6, 1922 abolishes the Tcheka and replaces it with a Political Direction of the State: GPU, or Guépéou, organization whose name is changed to Coordinated Political Direction of the State, or OGPU, on November 15, 1923.

1934 年 7 月 10 日的一项法令将国家安全部门的活动移交给内务人民委员部（NKVD）。

The activities of the State Security are transferred, by a decree of July 10, 1934, to a People's Commissariat for Internal Affairs or NKVD.

1938 年 7 月 20 日，拉夫连季·帕夫洛维奇·贝利亚被任命为内务人民委员部副部长，并于 12 月 8 日被任命为该组织的负责人。

On July 20, 1938, Lavrenti Pavlovich Beria was appointed deputy head of the NKVD and then, on December 8, was placed at the head of this organization.

贝利亚时期，苏联国家警察开始了近十五年的时期，在此期间，其组织和名称发生了巨大的变化，即使是专家也很难在相继采用的缩写词中找到自己的方向。1941 年 2 月 3 日，内务人民委员部分为两个部门：内务人民委员部和国家安全人民委员会（NKGB）。六个月后，与德国的敌对行动于 1941 年 7 月 20 日开始，仅导致内务人民委员部的重建。1943 年 4 月，与内务人民委员部一起新成立了独立的国家安全委员会。

With Beria a period of almost fifteen years begins for the Soviet State Police, during which the changes brought to its organization and its name will be such that even the specialist finds it very difficult to orient himself in the acronyms successively adopted. On February 3, 1941, the NKVD was split into two departments: NKVD and NKGB (People's Commissariat for State Security). Six months later, the opening of hostilities with Germany gave rise, on July 20, 1941, to the re-establishment of the NKVD alone. In April 1943, a new appearance of a separate NKGB alongside the NKVD.

战后，1946 年 3 月，所有人民委员部都更名为部委，内务人民委员会更名为内政部 (MVD)，NKGB 更名为国家安全部 (MGB)。

After the war, in March 1946, with all People's Commissariats being renamed ministries, the NKVD became the Ministry of Interior (MVD) and the NKGB became the Ministry of State Security (MGB).

1950 年左右，由于将原本属于 MVD 一部分的某些重要服务转移到该部，MGB 变得更加重要。

Around 1950, greater importance was given to the MGB by the transfer to this ministry of certain significant services which had been part of the MVD.

1953 年 3 月 7 日，斯大林去世后，L.P. 贝利亚出任内务部部长，该内务部由前内政部和国家安全部合并而成。

On March 7, 1953, after Stalin's death, L. P. Beria became minister of an MVD comprising the former merged MVD and MGB.

贝利亚去世后，党中央决定重新全面控制特勤局。1954 年 3 月 13 日的一项法令创建了一个新的专门组织：国家安全委员会或克格勃。

After Beria's death, the Party Central Committee decides to regain full control of the Secret Service. A decree of March 13, 1954 created a new specialized organization, the State Security Committee or KGB.

克格勃是所有苏联间谍和反情报活动的最高指挥机构，甚至对国防部下属的格鲁乌（中央情报局）行使权力，该机构是前红军第四办公室的延伸，负责军事间谍 活动。

The KGB is the supreme directing body for all Soviet espionage and counterintelligence activities, even exercising its authority over the GRU, Central Intelligence Administration, under the Ministry of Defense, an extension of the former 4th  Office of the Red Army, in charge of military espionage.

罗杰·盖森斯

Roger GHEYSENS

精选参考书目

Selected bibliography

– 维克多·亚历山德罗夫，《图哈切夫斯基事件》，罗伯特·拉丰，巴黎，1962 年。

– Alexandrov, Victor, The Tukhachevsky Affair, Robert Laffont, Paris, 1962.

– Alliluïeva，Svetlana，《给朋友的二十封信》，Seuil，巴黎，1967 年。

– Alliluïeva, Svetlana, Twenty letters to a friend, Seuil, Paris, 1967.

– Alliluïeva，Svetlana，《一年之内》，罗伯特·拉丰，巴黎，1969 年。

– Alliluïeva, Svetlana, In a single year, Robert Laffont, Paris, 1969.

– 安德斯·瓦迪斯瓦夫，《回忆录》（1939-1946 年），La Jeune Parque，巴黎，1948 年

– Anders, Wladyslaw, Memoirs (1939-1946), La Jeune Parque, Paris, 1948

– 约翰·巴伦，克格勃，爱思唯尔红杉，布鲁塞尔，1975 年

– Barron, John, KGB, Elsevier Sequoia, Brussels, 1975

– 贝利亚，塞尔戈，贝利亚我的父亲，斯大林主义权力的核心，Plon/Criterion，1999 年。

– Beria, Sergo, Beria my father, at the heart of Stalinist power, Plon/Criterion, 1999.

——《征服》，罗伯特，《大恐怖》，斯托克，巴黎，1970 年。

– Conquest, Robert, The Great Terror, Stock, Paris, 1970.

–征服，罗伯特：苏联的权力与政治。斯大林继承权的斗争，1945-1960，哈珀和罗，1967。

–Conquest, Robert: Power and Politics in the USSR. The Struggle for Stalin's Succession, 1945-1960, Harper and Row, 1967.

–《征服罗伯特：斯大林秘密警察内部：内务人民委员部政治：1936-39》，胡佛研究所出版社，1985 年。

– Conquest Robert: Inside Stalin's Secret Police: NKVD Politics: 1936-39, Hoover Institution Press, 1985.

– Cookridge, E. H.，《菲尔比的真相》，Fayard，巴黎，1968 年。

– Cookridge, E. H., The truth about Philby, Fayard, Paris, 1968.

– Deakin, F. W. 和 Storry, GR，Le Cas Sorge，Robert Laffont，巴黎，1967 年。

– Deakin, F. W. and Storry, GR, Le Cas Sorge, Robert Laffont, Paris, 1967.

– Delarue, Jacques, History of the Gestapo, New World editions, 2008.

– Deriabine, Pierre and Gibney, Frank, Stalin's Policeman, Fayard, Paris, 1966.

– Djilas, Milovan, The new ruling class, Plon, Paris, 1957.

– Djilas, Milovan, Conversations with Stalin, Gallimard, Paris, 1962 and 1971.

– Kerensky, Alexander, Russia at the Turn of History, Plon, Paris, 1967.

– Khrushchev, Nikita, Memories, Robert Laffont, Paris, 1971.

– Werth, Alexander, Russia at war, volume I: 1941-1942, volume II: 1943-1945, Stock, Paris, 1965.

– Zawodny, JK, Katyn: massacre in the forest, Stock, Paris, 1971.

谢谢

Thanks

我为本书的写作付出了六年多的时间，他们为本书的写作提供了宝贵的帮助，我在此向 Madeline T. Hawes、Simon Kobiashvili、Wesley Pedersen、Andrew Pomian 和 Adam Schmidt 表示感谢。

For their invaluable help in the writing of this book, for which I have worked for more than six years, I would like to express my gratitude here to Madeline T. Hawes, Simon Kobiashvili, Wesley Pedersen, Andrew Pomian and Adam Schmidt.

我还要向驻苏联波兰军队总司令、前中将弗拉迪斯拉夫·安德斯 (Wladislav Anders) 表示敬意，在我们进行的多次会谈和交换的信件中，他给了我更多启发，特别是在私人问题上。他在克里姆林宫与斯大林以及卢比扬卡监狱与贝利亚进行了对话。

I would also like to pay tribute to former Lieutenant General Wladislav Anders, CB, Commander-in-Chief of the Polish Forces in the USSR, who, during the many talks we had and the letters we exchanged, enlightened me more particularly on the private conversations he had with Stalin in the Kremlin and with Beria in Lubyanka prison.

撒迪厄斯·维特林

Thaddeus Wittlin

1972 年 9 月

September 1972
